messages.text:
Theobert Mahler's expeditions to the Yucatan, 1890s. 

The trees are very young. In those latitudes, it only takes 15-20 years for a tree to grow to the size of the photo. 
It begs the question: When did the ruins become overgrown?
How long ago did ancient civilization leave this place? This is the heart of the rain forest!

messages.text:
Bailey Electric with an Edison battery during a thousand-mile test drive. 

Everyone knows that the internal combustion engine has a very low efficiency of about 23%. The electric motor has 90-95% efficiency. And knowing this, engineers and scientists continued to improve gasoline engines. As a result, the future is in electric motorsðŸ¤·

The technology has been known for a long time. But it was necessary to stall progress in the name of super profits from oil.

messages.text:
Horizontal traces on the steep walls are clearly not from a chisel or other hand tools. 

Such traces are left by the tunneling equipment. One version is that the excavation was made by a roadheader.

But historical chronicles tell that the mountain Nokogiri is simply an Edo period quarry in Japan (1603-1868) and there simply cut out tuff by hand.

The fatal connection between Abraham Lincoln and John F. Kennedy.

Lincoln was elected to Congress in 1846 and Kennedy in 1946. Lincoln was elected president in 1860 and Kennedy in 1960. Both were shot in the head. Both were shot on Friday. text:
Years before the Titanic met its fate at the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean, Morgan Robertson wrote his novel The Abyss, in which he described a ship that resembled the giant flotation ship in two drops of water. The unsinkable Titan (as the writer called his ship) ran into an iceberg and went underwater, taking the lives of most of the passengers with it.

And the tragedy in the book took place in the same month in which the real Titanic went down.

text_entities.text: "Titanic and Titanium

messages.text:
In 1945, a U.S. pilot accidentally saw a huge pyramid, and later an entire valley with pyramids in China, although previously it was certainly not known about it.

Twenty years after that, the media mentioned the Chinese pyramids, but then at one point everyone forgot about them. And in the 2000's, the Chinese government itself acknowledged the pyramids existed.

But almost immediately a military base was established there and the area became inaccessible for any research. Coincidence?

To this day it is not known what kind of pyramids in China, what was found in them, and how old they are? However it is possible to assume that China is not going to reveal these mysteries.

messages.text:
The Vatican Library is one of the most guarded sites in the world: its protection is more serious than that of any existing nuclear power plant. 

In addition to numerous Swiss guards, the library is guarded by modern automatic systems that form several levels of security. 

Only a limited number of people could get in. At the same time, the entrance to the archive does not imply free movement and access to any documents. The visitor indicates the topic of interest, and the appropriate literature is selected.

This kind of secrecy raises questions about what the Vatican archives actually hold. Probably that is where the library of Ivan the Terrible and the Library of Alexandria are kept.

messages.text:
In one of the ancient Chinese chronicles there is a description of a strange event: during the reign of Emperor Huang-Di (about 2600 BC) in the valley of the Huang He River was a machine from which emerged a creature with a copper head and antennae, in addition, it was four-eyed and six-armed. 

A moving metal creature with antennae - who would believe it? But for a modern person this is a typical description of a robot, and the chronicle was written under the emperor, describing the smallest details, which excludes the author's imagination.

messages.text:
For the first time about these mysterious tungsten springs began to talk in 1991, when geologists found them in samples of sand of the Narada River small spiral-shaped parts.

Then similar spirals were found several times in the Circumpolar Urals in the region of the Kozhim and Balbanyu rivers, as well as in Tajikistan and Chukotka. The objects consist of tungsten and molybdenum.

Studies have yielded results - they are between 20,000 and 318,000 years old. Imagine, tungsten melts at 3,400 degrees. That's a Late Paleolithic minimum. And the school says there were only stone scrapers back then.

messages.text:
A manuscript from the 16th century, with images of weapons, rockets and other flying machines.

In fact, similar records, manuscripts and other written sources, as well as images, found not a few, and all have a very different age. 

Found this very manuscript in the Romanian town of Sibiu, the discovery was made by Professor Dou Toderiu in 1961. It was written by Conrad Haas in 1556. Just what he depicted and described is difficult to explain and put into official history. People back then knew nothing about spaceflight and flying machines, but this engineer proves otherwise.

On the pages were found drawings of ballistic missiles, various types of artillery weapons, something resembling a modern rocket, the most various mechanisms, apparatuses and most importantly, saucer-like flying machines.

text:
Louis XVI was predicted that he would die on the 21st. The frightened king sat in his bedroom on the 21st of each month, received no one and appointed no affairs. But the precautions proved futile!

On June 21, 1791, Louis and his wife Marie Antoinette were arrested. On September 21, 1792, the republic was proclaimed in France and royal authority was abolished. And on 21 January 1793 Louis XVI was executed.

messages.text:
Old bolt.

It's a bolt that has grown into the coal. Given the age of the seam from which this coal was extracted, we can say that the bolt is at least 300 million years old. A slight discrepancy with the official history, considering that for 300 million years (according to the official history) there weren't even dinosaurs on Earth.

messages.text:
The mysterious Ayud Artifact

In 1974, in Romania, near the town of Ayud, a group of workers, at a depth of 10 meters, discovered the bones of long extinct mastodons, and a wedge with several holes, which have clear traces of machining.

Analysis of the artifact showed that it is a complex alloy of 12 different elements, the main one being aluminum, which was learned to work only in the 16th century! At a time when mastodons appeared 35 million years ago and became extinct 10,000 years ago.

messages.text:
Crystal astronaut 

The figure on the photo is made of rock crystal from 1500 BC. Found in Anatolia. The Indo-European Hittites of the Bronze Age couldn't have worked the hard mineral so cleanly. Or did they use laser carving? The character's suit of armor differs sharply from the clothing and weapons of the Hittite kingdom. In the Walters Museum (Baltimore), the object has only a serial number. Science ignores the artifact.

messages.text:
The steam engine of the 1st century.

Heron of Alexandria was a scientist, engineer, mechanic, mathematician, and simple genius. He invented: vending machines for holy water, automatic doors for temples, a distance meter, a fire pump, fountains, and ... a steam engine. 

The device was a cauldron of water, a fire was built underneath, water boiled, and steam gushed out to propel the device. Modern replicas made according to Geron's drawings were spun up to 3,500 rpm. The level of technology and scientific thought was such that official science was able to reach the steam engine anew only in the 19th century.

Although there are plenty of such artifacts, this does not prevent scientists from selectively recognizing such artifacts as fakes and everything around them as originals.

messages.text:
Giant stone spheres.

These giant stone spheres have been present from Costa Rica to Bosnia and Herzegovina and come in a variety of sizes. They were first discovered in South America in the 1930s by workers clearing the jungle.

South American legends say that unimaginable treasures are hidden in the rocks. This led to the destruction of many of these spheres by people who did not realize their historical value. Although many of these spheres have been destroyed, no one has ever discovered anything inside them.

No one can explain what these giant stone spheres were created for.

messages.text:
An unknown object on Mars.

In March 2017, Ops Rover, the Mars probe, took a photograph that looked like a mass of metal on the surface of Mars. This clear image shows an unusually shiny, jagged and sharp object lying on the rough surface of Mars. The resolution of this picture is clear, removing any doubt of fraud.

messages.text:
The Roman writer Petronius wrote in the first century A.D. about an amazing glass from which a vessel was made that was presented to Emperor Tiberius by a certain master. When the vessel was thrown on the stone floor, it did not shatter, but only changed its shape. The master immediately returned the vessel to its original form. 

To remain the sole owner of the unique glass vessel, Tiberius immediately ordered the beheading of the master glassblower. So the secret of the flexible glass was lost for two thousand years. Only in 2012, the American glass company Corning managed to make its analogue - a glass material so flexible that it can be crumpled and twisted.

Only in 2012, the American glass company Corning managed to make its analogue - a glass material so flexible that it can be crumpled and twisted.

text:
The photos from Mars taken by the rovers showed a real shell, just like on Earth. 

The photos themselves were taken back in 2014, but the strange object has only now been noticed by bloggers. In the photo - the slope of a small hill, and in this slope "embedded" something that strikingly resembles the Earth "houses for snails. In general, if you do not know that this is happening on Mars, you might think that somewhere in the Earth's desert another fossil was found. 

The shell most closely resembles ammonites. Such shells are found all over the globe. Is it a random fossil or is it really a snail print?

text:
During the lidar survey of Mexico, scientists found about 500 Mesoamerican monuments, which were estimated to be 3,000 years old. 

Some monuments and architecture were clearly attributed to the Maya civilization, but the Maya must have lived 1000 years later. On the other hand, some of the settlements were attributed to the Olmecs, who were the predecessors of the Maya. And according to the new data, they would have to be considered either two branches of the same civilization, or peoples developing in parallel.

text:
The U.S. Uppolons brought 382 kilograms of soil for 6 missions, while the three Soviet missions brought 324 grams.

The Americans promised that they would distribute the soil all over the world, but then they said that the soil would be stored in special containers until the world had "more accurate instruments for analysis". The samples were nevertheless shared - the USSR was given 2 g, and the Chinese - 1 g. For a time and on condition of obligatory return without mass loss of sample.

text:
The papyrus of the ancient Egyptians was a kind of "calendar of happy and unlucky days" based on astrology. 

The ancient horoscope is not surprising (and who wouldn't want to know their future?), what is surprising is that 4,000 years ago, the calculations on the papyrus took into account the star Algol in the constellation Perseus. The Egyptians had managed to describe its behavior 3,000 years before it was discovered. While observing the star from Earth without the use of technology is impossible.

text:
Egypt, Persia and Cambodia unanimously chose as one of the divine symbols the three-horned king's hat with inlay. Add unified patterns, structures and religious symbols and you get an interesting situation - one on all symbols of power, which usually indicates belonging to one civilization. 

But the traditional history of mankind argues to the contrary. So who should we believe, our eyes or the historians?

text:
The ancient city of Puma Punku in Bolivia. 

Many words have already been said that the mysterious technologies that were used to process the stones do not lend themselves to the logic of the modern version of history. Ancient people could not process stones in such a way. Everything is too smooth and skillful. There is no explanation for Puma Punku either. 

But as we know, history may have been rewritten. There is a sense that there was once construction going on here that required stone details of certain shapes created with incredible precision.

text:
An ancient map of the galaxy.

The galactic disk is a map of our universe, with an exact marking of the solar system, several thousand years old. Scientists could not give an exact answer as to what it was and why it was intended. 

However, they agreed that the shape of this object strongly resembles our galaxy, and the holes left on it correspond to our position in it. Perhaps this is just a bunch of coincidences, but then what is this object?

text:
A nuclear reactor 1.8 billion years old.

In the 1970s, scientists discovered deposits of uranium ore in West Africa, in Gabon, but it turned out to be a nuclear reactor.

There were six zones where uranium nuclei fission reactions were taking place. Scientists said it was all a coincidence of nature, but the "reactor" itself, launched about 1.8 billion years ago, most of the time worked in slow boiling mode.

Many experts have estimated the probability of such a coincidence of nature at 0.001%.

text:
Siberia without a forest, photos from the 19th and early 20th centuries.

There were few forests in Siberia in the early 20th century, and those that were there were not as dense and impassable. 

On old maps, the territory of Siberia was inhabited, especially the rivers. And if things had gone that way, and the population developed without upheaval - we would have seen thick mulch, peat bogs, impenetrable thickets, tall and voluminous pine trees here. But for some reason, trees began to grow only at the end of the 19th century.

text:
The catastrophe tore apart the once unbroken island of Iapan.

Has anyone ever told you that Japan looked different not long ago? It was called Iapan. It's easy to see why this country is now called Japan. 

Even a relatively short time ago, everything was different. In the atlas of Ortelius (1570) it is a huge island, almost the size of modern India. And not only that atlas, but also Daniel Keller's map (1590), Mercator's map (1575), etc. 

Most likely, the island was torn apart as a result of seismic activity of the Earth's crust, which at the end of the XVII-beginning of the XVIII centuries, "shook up" the entire region, changing some of the geographical objects beyond recognition. But for some reason, such "big changes" science is used to hide deep into the centuries, somewhere near the dinosaurs. But this is our nearest history, only 300-400 years ago.

text:
The drawing from life depicts a ball in the Engineers' Castle in St. Petersburg in 1869.

Did you notice the brightness of the spotlights is as good as modern LEDs? Gas lamps did not provide any bright directional light, and candles look like a decorative interior element.

Let me remind you that the ball was in 1869. The official start of the electric age in the Russian Empire began with the lighting of the Liteiny Bridge in 1879. And the Winter Palace received electricity in 1885.

text:
Fear gripped people all over Europe when thousands of birds began to fall dead from the sky

200 Ducks in Denmark, hundreds of Herons in Turkey, thousands of Swallows and Swifts in Greece, 1000 Starlings in Rome... Birds are literally falling dead from the sky and no one knows why. Thousands of dead Swallows and Swifts were found in the last three days in the streets of Athens, on the balconies of apartments in the capital, on islands in the Aegean Sea and around a lake near the sea port of Nauplia in the Peloponnese.

Thus, there is a clear increase in the number of birds mysteriously dying and falling from the sky. But no one can really tell the cause of these mass deaths.

text:
A 2039 coin was found in Mexico.

At a construction site in Mexico, a man named Diego Avila discovered a strange round piece of metal that looked like a coin. When the man cleaned the find of dirt, it turned out that the piece of metal was actually a coin, but made of silver. The Nazi symbolism - an eagle with a swastika - was clearly visible on it.

Beneath the Nazi symbolism on the coin you could see the date, 2039, with "New Germany" written over the swastika. On the back of the medal are written German words that translate as "all in one nation."

text:
French counter tokens from the end of the 17th century depicted flying machines. The official version is that these tokens depicted the wheel from the vision of the prophet Ezekiel. 

It was of shining metal and contained living beings like men. If we discard the religious and mystical flavor, the "wheels" seen by the prophet could very well be considered a flying saucer.

text:
In the USA in the 19th century there was a series of strange fires, almost 100 cities burned down in one century. They all had common features:

1) A city burned completely, and there were very few deaths. In Chicago, 17,000 homes burned and fewer than 300 people were affected.

2) Photos of the ruins. Historians write that cities were almost entirely made of wood and that is why they burned so often, but the photos almost always show ruins made of stone.

3) Preserved trees and wooden posts. The photos show completely destroyed brick buildings, but intact trees, some even have foliage on them.

text:
Homo naledi is one of the first members of the human species, which appeared about 2.8-2.5 million years ago, i.e. it was still close to apes. The first remains of this species were found in 2013 in a cave in South Africa.

Overcoming areas with vertical shafts narrowed so that the researchers had to exhale and chest compressions to get through, performing literal acrobatic tricks on climbing equipment on sheer walls of 12-meter-high, the researchers came across the burial of the child H.Naledi. The researchers assumed that the body was deliberately brought to such a hard-to-reach area, implying a rather high level of culture. In a creature "not far removed from an ape".

text:
The underground world of Earth is not studied in the best way.

For example, on old maps, there is a legendary underground city of Grustina. Even 300-500 years ago it belonged to Tartaria and connected the neighboring cities by underground passages. The city was under modern-day Tomsk, where even now the underground passages and exits to the surface are known to many local residents.

It is interesting that the city is on many European maps, information about it can be found in the memoirs of merchants, monks, travelers, at different times have visited Russia. In Russian literature, however, mentions of such a miracle of architecture are destroyed, and remain only in Karamzin and Klyuchevsky.

text:
Portrait of Li Qingyun (1677-1933).

He was born in 1677 and died in 1933. He was a master of martial arts, collected medicinal herbs for the first 100 years of his life, the last 156 - bought them from others and traded them. 

He outlived many loved ones, was married 23 times, and became a father about 200 times over 11 generations. Lee was a vegetarian, he never drank alcohol, never smoked, and ate only at set times. He went to bed early and got up early. He liked to play cards. Old grandfathers recalled that he was old when their grandfathers were young.

All this may seem like a hoax if one is unaware of Chinese Taoist traditions and the many legends of immortal Taoists who live in the mountains.

text:
Sumerian bags, Olmec bags, Maori bags, Egyptian bags, Indian bags and handbags at Gobekli Tepe, rock art from the Americas and Australia. 

Not a bad geography of distribution! Especially if you consider the age of the bags on the Gebekli Tepe reliefs (11,000 years) and similar bags on the Coso petroglyphs, in the United States (from 5-16 thousand years). Birds on long legs are also somewhat similar.

Have you already imagined how the Neolithic peoples exchanged cultural data 10,000 years ago?

text:
Ancient Conquerors of Heaven.

In 1875, in one of the ancient Indian temples, a treatise was discovered called Vimanika Shastra, written in the Brahmanical language, Sanskrit. 

It was not its age (it was written 2,400 years ago) that made this document famous, but its content. The author of the manuscript described the types of flying machines and their construction.

At the end of the 19th century, this book was considered mythological because aviation was still in its infancy. But modern scientists, having studied "Vimanika Shastra" unequivocally declared that it is competently written technical work. The names of some of the metals and liquids needed to lift flying machines still defy translation.

text:
Poltergeist phenomenon

In 1977, the American family Enfield was visited by a poltergeist. And not some mysterious spirit that mysteriously disappeared before the appearance of strangers. No, this spirit was not afraid of any observers who came out of the Enfield house dumbfounded. In the house, furniture was constantly being dropped, mysterious and eerie noises were being made, and people were being tossed in the air like puppets. The girl who was most harassed by the spirit levitated over her bed; there were also instances of teleportation within the house. Subsequently, this story became the basis for the horror movie "The Curse-2," although few people know that it is based on very real events.

text:
A mosaic from the ancient Roman city of Palestrina. 100 BC depicts a recognizable dinosaur (resembling an iguanodon). The inscription is easily readable in Russian "crocodilopardalik". Pardus or pardalik was a leopard in Ancient Rus. 

Two proofs in one: the proximity of "extinct" reptiles to humans and the Russian writing before the Cyrillic alphabet.

text:
The Mystery of Stonehenge

One of the most interesting problems, over which the greatest minds have been beating for centuries, but solving the mystery is still to come.

Stonehenge consists of 82 megaliths weighing 5 tons, 30 blocks, each weighing 25 tons, and 5 trilithons (arches of three stones), weighing 50 tons each.

Now we can only guess who built this structure, what its mission and purpose are. And also how was it built?

text:
This seventeenth-century engraving of Jesus Christ wearing a crown of thorns is titled "One with a single line. 

Indeed, what from a distance resembles an ordinary drawing is, up close, an image created with a single line that spirals in a spiral. All details of the face and the transitions of light and shadow are created by the thickening of this line. The artist was Claude Mellan from France.

For the artist's contemporaries, his method of engraving remained a mystery, and no one has been able to repeat it.

text:
There are many versions about the origin of the Moon. Some of them are so unbelievable that they seem like nonsense. Just a few facts that suggest that our satellite is artificial:

1. The satellite always faces the same side of the Earth. The reverse side differs greatly from the visible side by its irregularity. If the Moon is a natural body of the system, there should be no such thing.
2. Almost all lunar craters are circular. This means that the asteroids hit the surface at right angles. 
3. the moon reflects light at the full moon by the entire surface of the disk. According to the laws of optics, the edges of the disk should be dim and barely visible. The angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection - this law of optics is violated by the Moon.
4. the perfect coincidence of the size of the Moon with the size of the visible solar disk from the Earth. Therefore, we see an eclipse and a "corona" on the Moon.

4. the perfect coincidence of the size of the Moon with the size of the visible solar disk from the Earth. Therefore, we see an eclipse and a "corona" on the Moon.
Forbidden Science

text:
What has mankind lost from changing the Mendeleev table and moving the zero group?

Before hydrogen there are elements with smaller atomic weights, and in the null group there is a limiting element with a negligibly small atomic weight, incapable of chemical interactions and possessing extremely fast intrinsic partial (gas) motion. Pure dark matter, as physicists now assume, although it is unlikely that Mendeleev knew about it. 

What gave the idea of the world ether - the transfer of energy over distances. It is ignoring the ether that leads to the false but profitable conclusion that energy can only be extracted by destroying matter. Hence the false thesis that current fuel energy has no real alternative.

text:
The lake "Svyatoe" is located in Russia in the Ryazan region. The lake is round in shape, there are no streams or rivers flowing in - it has no tributaries, the water in the lake is constantly clean and clear. Another peculiarity is that there are no algae or other aquatic plants in it.

Scientists say that the Lake is of meteoric origin, a little over a thousand years old.

An interesting point: on old maps, this lake is not marked at all (for example, on the maps of 1816, 1832 this lake is not present), it appears only after 1865. In the samples taken from the depth, Cesium-137 was found. In the samples taken from the upper layers there is no Cesium-137. Cesium-137 is produced only by nuclear decay of uranium or plutonium, no other way Cesium-137 appears.

Ancient nuclear technology?

text:
Andrew Carlssin

In 2003, the FBI arrested a man on charges of stock market fraud. Owning only $800, he was able to make $350 million in 2 weeks, while making only 126 very risky transactions.

After his arrest, when he was demanded to give up his accomplices, he admitted that he got his information from the future. He said he arrived in a time machine from the year 2256, but refused to disclose its location. Some time later, someone posted a $1 million bail for him, and E. Karlsin disappeared.

text:
The Leiden Gazette wrote about the flying ship of the monk Andrea Grimaldi in 1751: 

"It has a speed of 7 miles per hour, with enough fuel for three hours of flight. It is shaped like a bird, inside the machine are 30 wheels and chains, 6 copper tubes, partially filled with mercury. "Grimaldi flew across the Channel from Calais to Dover. From there he flew to London, where he spoke to famous mechanics about the construction of his machine."

Add here a letter from London, stored in Italy, confirming the flight. There is a scientific study of the "bird," certified by three academics, which is kept in Lyon, France. 150 years before the Wright brothers and their first airplane.

text:
2639-2506 B.C. The material is black diorite, one of the strongest materials on Earth.

It can resist neither alkali nor acid, perfectly capable of withstanding the influence of the environment and time. Because of its longevity, it has been used so that objects made of it could survive up to 3,000 to 5,000 years later.

Scientists and textbooks claim that it was made with stones, sticks and copper tubing 3,000 to 1,000 years ago BC. They didn't know iron then and the tools were primitive.

text:
This pretty bronze bell was found in America, in 1944, inside a lump of coal. Bituminous coal from West Virginia dates from about 323 to 298 million years ago.

A serious problem for the traditional theory of evolution! Couldn't a hand bell (indeed, any man-made item at all) get inside coal that was formed even before the dinosaurs evolved?

text:
Legends of robots are found in ancient Greek epics: according to one version Zeus gave Europe a giant bronze robot called Talos, according to another, the giant was forged by Hephaestus and Cyclops. Apollonius of Rhodes wrote in his poem "Argonautica" that "he was a breed of men of bronze, of ash wood, the last surviving son of the gods. The copper giant threw himself into the fire and, glowing red-hot, he embraced his enemies in a fiery embrace. 

Argonautica tells of a robot-Talos in the 3rd century B.C., the first humanoid robot was assembled by Da Vinci around 1595.

text_entities.text:
Legends of robots are found in ancient Greek epics: according to one version Zeus gave Europe a giant bronze robot called Talos, according to another, the giant was forged by Hephaestus and Cyclops. Apollonius of Rhodes wrote in his poem "Argonautica" that "he was a breed of men of bronze, of ash wood, the last surviving son of the gods. The copper giant threw himself into the fire and, glowing red-hot, he embraced his enemies in a fiery embrace. 

Argonautica tells of a robot-Talos in the 3rd century B.C., the first humanoid robot was assembled by Da Vinci around 1595.
Forbidden Science

text:
Edgar Poe's Rumors of a Time Machine

Edgar Poe's A Tale of the Adventures of Arthur Gordon Pym tells how four shipwreck survivors were forced to eat a young sailor named Richard Parker. Poe said it was based on true events, but in reality it was not.

Forty-six years after this book was written, a shipwreck actually occurred and the rescued crewmen decided to eat their yungu, whose name was... Richard Parker. This fact sparked rumors that the writer had a time machine. And he had access to extraterrestrial technology.

text:
In the photo you can see two babies: Horus, the god of ancient Egypt, on the left, and Jesus on the right. And besides the scene depicted, they have quite a lot in common. Here are a few facts for you:

Horus was born by the star Sirius, and Jesus was born by the "star in the East". 

Horus was tried to kill Seth, but Isis fled to the island of Chammis, and Jesus was tried to kill Herod, and Mary fled to Egypt.

Neither Horus nor Jesus was married or had children.

The coincidence of so many facts of life is not coincidental. Perhaps it is the same moment in history, described by different people and adapted for different peoples and adapted to their realities.

text:
The Barabar cave system in India. 200 to 300 B.C. 

The caves are carved in gneiss, as hard as granite. Vaults, floors, and ceilings are polished to a shine. The acoustics and ventilation of the caves are ideal. There are reservoirs for water and hermetic closing of the doorways. 

There is a version that the caves were used in ancient times as a bomb shelter. The vaults are capable of withstanding a nuclear strike. Ancient skeletons with high levels of radiation are often found in the vicinity.

text:
Millions of years, the oxygen level in the atmosphere of the planet was about 40% (according to the analysis of air bubbles inside the amber), now it is no higher than 20%. The oxygen level is higher, the gravitational force is slightly lower, add a warm climate (all officially recognized by traditional science) and we get that in ancient times there were all conditions for the flora and fauna of that time to reverberate with gigantism everywhere. 

However, if images of giant animals, plants and temples of incredible size are the norm and do not raise doubts about the credibility of historians and scientists, then all images of people of gigantic stature are metaphor, fiction and "so painted".

text:
Mammoths found with undigested grass in their stomachs have been lying in the permafrost for several thousand years, historians say. 

But a historian is not a chemist. A historian cannot explain why mammoths did not decompose under the influence of their own gastric juice. Gastric juice needs body temperature (35-37 degrees) to work properly. But there is hydrochloric acid in the gastric juice. And here's a surprise for the historian who skipped chemistry in school. The average permafrost temperature is about -15 degrees, and hydrochloric acid continues to work even at -30 degrees.  Slower, of course, but did mammoths not decompose in "thousands of years"?

text:
If to take official data on building of Cheops pyramid, it turns out that for one hour "ancient Egyptians" cut down, processed, moved, lifted and installed 9 blocks on 2.5 tons each, 220 a day. This is without taking into account the fact that people were under the scorching sun for 12 hours, worked at night and they all had to be provided with water and food.

Japanese engineers 40 years ago tried to build a copy of the pyramid seven times smaller. They wanted to build it in a month, they built it in a year. A truck and a helicopter were involved in the construction because the construction methods described in the story surprisingly did not work.

text:
An 1892 bipolar Edison fan.

What an artifact! The fan is not powered by the mains, but by direct current. And the current is produced in a system of several inductor coils with a closed magnetic core. The fan screw is supposed to spin forever, and the regulation is set with a golden lever. It's a neat design.

text:
Until recently, it was considered impossible to extract DNA from mummies because it was believed that embalming destroyed the deoxyribonucleic acid. More recently, however, scientists have been able to develop a new method that allows DNA extraction.

They first tried the method on Neanderthals, and then moved on to mummies. As a result, they got the genes of more than 80 mummies, among which were the pharaohs. Detailed study of the genes shocked the scientific world, because as it turned out - the pharaohs have nothing in common with the Egyptians. Moreover, all ancient Egyptian rulers were Caucasoids.

text:
In the early 1930s, Swedish aerial engineer Henri Kjellson in Tibet observed Tibetan monks delivering stones to build a temple. A stone about 1.5 meters in diameter was piled into a hole 15 cm deep. The site was 100 meters away from the 400 meter high cliff on top of which the temple was being built.

At 63 meters from the pit, stood 19 musicians, followed by 200 monks. In the center of this formation lay a stone.

The musicians had 13 big drums, each weighing 150 kg, and their sounding surface was directed to the pit with the stone. Near each trumpet stood two musicians, blowing it in turn. At a special command, the whole orchestra would play loudly and the choir of monks would sing along in unison. 

Four minutes later, when the sound was at its maximum, the boulder in the pit began to shake and climb to the top of the 400 meter high rock! According to Henri's story, the monks were lifting five to six huge boulders to the temple under construction every hour!

text:
With the advent of photography, in the 19th century, hundreds of images of giant people were published. How is it that there were so many of them in the 19th century, but now we can count them on our fingers?

In the theory about the people left after the catastrophe of the 16th-17th century, tall people fit well. The tall doors, ceilings and steps of buildings can be justified by this. Due to climate change and living conditions, giants could no longer survive and 19th century photos are their last evidence...

text:
In 2019, an unusual artifact was discovered on the shores of the Baltic Sea. It consisted of an alloy of four rare metals that had been pressed into stone. 

Two holes were found on the back side of the artifact, thanks to which the stone was filled with rare fractions. The examination showed that the stone is about 140,000 years old, and it is not yet known what meaning it carries.

Surprisingly, scientists do not try to explain this artifact in any way and for the most part simply ignore it.

text:
Silendskii skull.

This skull was found in 2007, but the find was kept strictly secret until 2010. Researchers concluded that it probably belonged to an unknown species of mammal. Radiocarbon dating showed that its owner lived between 1200 and 1280 AD. 

Silendstskiy skull is almost one and a half times the size of a human, and the most prominent part of it is the huge eye sockets. From the structure of the skull, scientists have determined that the creature walked on its hind legs, swam very well and was three meters tall. The structure of the teeth indicates that the owner of the skull was a predator. 

Unfortunately, no more information about its owner Silendstskiy skull and gave no other information. Who did such an unusual skull belong to?

text:
Baalbek Trilithon.

The Temple of Jupiter Baal Baalbek, Lebanon, 290 feet long and 160 feet wide, was created as the largest religious complex in the Roman Empire. As impressive as it is, one of the most impressive aspects of the site is almost hidden from view: beneath and behind the ruins of the temple itself are three massive blocks of stone called the Trilithon.

These three stone blocks are the largest building blocks ever used by humans anywhere in the world. Each is 70 feet long, 14 feet high, 10 feet thick, and weighs about 800 tons. 

No one knows how these stone blocks were cut, delivered from a nearby quarry, and fitted together so precisely.

text:
An interesting discovery was recently made by an archaeology enthusiast. He was researching satellite photos in order to analyze the processes taking place in the world's oceans. As part of this research he noticed that on the ocean floor stretches a long wall that connects the poles with each other.

This strange formation originates in the Arctic, off the coast of Yamal. The height of this wall is about 1 kilometer. In some places, according to the images, it can not be seen, as it is covered with sand. In other places, one can see structures resembling gates.

Many experts believe that this is a man-made object, as the nature couldn't create such a huge formation of ideal geometric shape.

text:
Indian scientists studied the cave temple of Ellora to find out the secret of the unique preservation of ancient frescoes. The researcher paid attention to the better, compared with the others, preservation of the temple No. 12. An analysis of the plaster yielded an unexpected result: hemp was found in the mixture for finishing the walls.

The ancient plaster was studied in every possible way. The ancient Indian plasterers had added 10% hemp stalk fibers to the mixture of clay and lime, and the mixture gave the plaster almost supernatural properties. This mixture protected the wall paintings of the Tin Tal Temple from destruction and insects for 1,500 years. 

The magical herb retains heat, regulates humidity levels, is non-toxic, fireproof and has soundproofing properties. And all of these properties of hemp have been known since the 6th century.

text:
The Chinese lunar rover Yutu-2 discovered a strange cube-shaped object on the back side of the Moon.

Yutu-2 spotted a "monolith" at a distance of about 80 meters during its lunar mission. So far, the unknown object has been dubbed the "mysterious hut".

Now the lunar rover will take about 2-3 months to reach it in order to study it.

text:
A piece of rock with a solidified imprint of a shoe sole in its surface was found in the coal beds of Nevada. 

Not only the contours of the sole were visible, but also a series of stitches that fastened the parts of the shoe.

The engineer showed the find to geologists at Columbia University, who considered what they saw an imitation, although they acknowledged that the coal piece of rock may date back more than 5 million years.

They did not dare to go any further with the research. The only known photograph was published in a New York newspaper in 1922.

text:
The Lunyu Caves attract attention not only by their strange traces of machining, but also by their purely mathematical mystery. According to approximate calculations, about 900,000 cubic meters of stone were removed during the works on the creation of these caves. Not a bad amount of work for the ancient world.

No matter how the stone was processed, almost one million cubic meters of siltstone must have been preserved somewhere, but neither houses, nor temples, nor palaces, nor roads were found from it, not even a trace of industrial waste. It can't be that the rock just evaporated.

text:
The belief in an unchanging climate led scientists to conclude that the woolly mammoth was a fan of cold regions. But camels, kangaroos, and fenecks are also furry, although they live in deserts. 

The wool must be in an elevated state for proper insulation. Like Antarctic harbor seals. Mammoths, on the other hand, do not have a raised coat.

Another factor of protection against the cold is the presence of sebaceous glands, which secrete oils on the skin and fur. Mammoths had no sebaceous glands, and their dry hair allowed the snow to touch their skin, melt, and greatly increase heat loss (the thermal conductivity of water is about 12 times higher than that of snow).

Not an Arctic animal, not a northern animal. Whatever historians say, biologists have their own opinion.

text:
It is believed that elephants in the Americas disappeared with the end of the last glaciation, i.e., about 12,000 years ago. But the elephant was known to the Olmecs, so much so that it was even depicted in figural pottery. Either elephants still lived in the Olmec age, which contradicts the paleozoological data, or the Olmec craftsmen were familiar with African elephants, which contradicts the modern historical views. 

But the fact remains that it is possible, if not to feel it with hands, then to see it with your own eyes in a museum. Unfortunately, academic science studiously sidesteps such absurd "trifles".

text:
Williams' fork.

The find of amateur archaeologist John Williams still excites the international scientific community. In 1998, Williams discovered a strange stone with an electrical socket similar to modern designs embedded in it. The easiest thing would have been to recognize the artifact as false - except that radiocarbon analysis shows that the enigmatite is more than a thousand years old.

text:
Archaeologists from St. Petersburg have found fossilized metal toothed cylinders in Kamchatka, which turned out to be parts of a mechanism. They are 400 million years old. This is not the first time ancient artifacts have been found in this region. This find is encrusted in stone, which is understandable since there are numerous volcanoes on the peninsula. Spectral analysis showed that the mechanism was made of metal parts, and all the parts were dated back 400 million years!

The creations of human hands embedded in rocks millions of years old were until recently ignored. After all, the findings violated the generally accepted fact of human evolution and even the formation of life on Earth.

text:
A large number of drawings and statuettes of various ages found around the world are interpreted as images of astronauts wearing spacesuits or sealed helmets. 

One can, of course, put it down to the artist's imagination. However, the resemblance is sometimes quite surprising.

text:
In the 1980s, Italian geologist Angelo Pitoni led diamond mining in the Republic of Sierra Lyon. During his work in the layers of rocks about 17 thousand years old, Pitoni found several stone figures depicting anthropomorphic reptiloids. Some of them were in the form of giant riders seated on elephants.

One of the figures contained something. An X-ray showed that there was a cavity in the lower part of the figure in which, like a rattle, a small black ball was rolling around. When it was extracted, it turned out that the ball was made of chrome steel.  Do you think the artifacts are real or are they all fakes?

text:
Another mystery of the Chinese Lunyu Caves is the lack of evidence. Imagine a huge cave complex, thousands of people mining stone, 900,000 cubic meters of excavated rock, and not a single mention of the construction or even the existence of the complex. A fantastic expenditure of effort, time and resources does not deserve even the slightest mention?

Scientists don't like to talk about versions where phenomenal objects were built by ancient advanced civilizations. But then let them offer their own version.

text:
These artifacts were discovered by residents of the Mexican province of Jalisco. The Mexican government has agreed to reveal to the public several Mexican paleocontact artifacts that have remained hidden for many decades since their discovery.

The stone artifacts are mysterious because they depict aliens with flying ships and other scenes of their lives. Comets and planets can also be seen on the stones.

The artifacts, are filled with detailed information about life in those distant times and depict scenes of long-forgotten history that have remained hidden from society until now.

text:
In 2017, the remains of two cave lion cubs were found in Siberia, thought to be twins - a male and a female, both no more than two months old. 

And then conducted genetic analysis and found that the lioness Sparta is 28,000 years old and the lion cub Boris is more than 40,000 years old. Scientists figured out the age of the lion cubs, but who can explain how the remains of different ages ended up in the same cave, in the same layer, 15,000 years apart?

text:
In 1931, Robert Shippy from an airplane was able to see an unknown object, more precisely, a long wall and a powerful defensive rampart, a total length of about 80 km. The structure was called the Great Wall of Peru.

It can be concluded that the ancient peoples of South America could build a huge, technologically complex project. But who and how exactly built the wall is a question for historians. Who, however, demonstratively ignore such an artifact.

text:
It is believed that the first chariots were used in ancient Egypt in the 16th century BC. More precisely, it was believed until archaeologists unearthed a combat chariot in the Great Sintashta Kurgan in the Urals.

Analysis of the horse's bones yielded an age of 2026 BC, when the Egyptians had not yet (officially) invented a combat vehicle.

Sintashta chariot was not the only one, analogues were found in 16 different burials. And again the discrepancy - all the wheels of the found chariots were with spokes. The first wheel with spokes was created in Asia Minor a couple of centuries later than the Sinti find.

text:
The Devil's Cigar mushroom has a funny name and a paradoxical history - on our planet it grows only in Japan and American Texas. At the same latitude, with 11,000 miles of ocean in between. That said, according to geneticists, the Japanese and Texas ecosystems have been separated for 19 million years.

According to the official history the continents separated 175 million years ago and before the famous voyage of Columbus other nations had no connection to America. Then it is unclear how the mushroom ended up in the Americas.

text:
A single building style across the land, twin buildings thousands of kilometers apart - "so built"?

Baalbek in Lebanon, the Orthodox Cathedral of St. Peter and Paul in Sevastopol, the Old Museum in Kerch on Mount Mithridates, Germany, Italy, USA, Delphi, Austria, Athens, Paris, Armenia - the same arches, pilasters, towers, columns, balustrades.

text:
In June 2020, an ancient ship about 10 meters long thawed out of the permafrost in Naryan-Mar. The fact that it was not a modern boat was confirmed by the forged nails fastening the remains of the hull. Bones of some animals were found above the hull.

Black soil, which looked like humus, was visible. But there is no such layer of humus in these latitudes. Naryan-Mar is located in the tundra zone in a subarctic area with permafrost.  It turns out that there was a big boat on the bank of the ancient river, and it was covered by the mudflow. 

Is it possible to date the ship? Yes, the nails fastening the hull are made of iron. On the one hand, this suggests that the find is only a few hundred years old, but on the other hand - the permafrost is tens of thousands.

text:
Have you heard of electric cannons that fire without gunpowder and use the power of a magnet?

In June 1932, the magazine Modern Mechanix reported on the achievements of science, and in fact continued the work of Tesla and the domestic inventor Filippov.

"Silent cannons sending their whistling messengers of death into the sky at speeds far in excess of those now attained by gunpowder shells seem likely for the next war, using for motion magnetic fields so powerful that when short-circuited they cause miniature earthquakes." 

Promising developments were, expectedly, forgotten and people returned to gunpowder weapons and gasoline and gasoline-powered vehicles.

What would have to happen for a two-story house to be buried up to the roof in the 300 years since the official discovery of America?

text:
This metal mug was found in 1912 by Frank Kennard, an Oklahoma power plant worker. The artifact was hidden from view inside a block of coal. 

According to scientists, the coal mined in the Oklahoma mines is 312 million years old. Until recently, that mug was stored in a private museum in America, in southern Missouri, then, the trail of the scandalous object was lost. Only a photograph remains.

text:
In the advertising catalogs before 1911, the chandeliers had no wires or parts to lead the cables out, although all were electric. How did the chandelier give light back then and what was the counterweight with a hole for?

"Tin-zinc amalgam is used to rub the pads of electric machines in order to strengthen their action. The most used is the Kinmeyer amalgam consisting of 2 parts mercury, 1 part zinc and 1 part tin." 
"Tin mercury amalgam was used in Christian churches to extract the energy of Jupiter."

These counterweights are ether capacitors with mercury amalgam, only on a small scale. When a gas discharge lamp was brought close to it, it would start to give off light.

text:
Overlaying old maps on modern terrain, finding old Tartarian cities would be difficult. How can you not believe in point impacts on the planet, when perfectly flat craters are in place of each city?

In Siberia, such sinkholes often become "devil's lakes". In Mongolia, on the other hand, rivers and lakes often dry up and the craters clearly show that only flat land, different in color from the surrounding area, is left in place of the city. Space bodies enter the atmosphere at an inclination, and to imagine that thousands of fragments fall all over the planet at right angles, leaving a crater of 5-7 km. is something from the realm of science fiction.

text:
Atmospheric pressure and salt are evidence of disaster.

Virtually all living things experience salt deficiency in the body. In doing so, the body replenishes it by drawing salt from other tissues, destroying bones and muscles. When atmospheric pressure drops, blood cells swell and burst. To avoid this, it is necessary to salt the blood.

Inside a human cell, the pressure is almost 8 times higher than atmospheric pressure, indicating that we are made for other conditions. For example, the pressure in the air bubbles in amber is 8 to 10 atmospheres, which was the pressure when they were formed.

Imagine a cell like a balloon. It's already on the verge, a slight decrease in pressure, and it's ready to burst. That is why our bodies are weakened, our lifespan is only 50-100 years and most people, from small changes in pressure - suffer. That's because a large part of our Earth's atmosphere has gone somewhere.

text:
An old photo of Mars showed strange square ruins.

This photo of Mars was taken by the Mars Global Surveyor, which was launched to Mars back in 1997. Recently, many of its old photos have been uploaded to one of NASA's sites and the "virtual" researchers have found there a very curious image number e1000462.

At the top of this photo, you can discern an object that looks like the square ruins of some large structure, almost covered with sand.

text:
In Altai, in Denisovskaya cave a bracelet was found, clearly indicating the presence of a highly developed civilization on the territory of Russia in the distant antiquity. And, surprisingly, the bracelet is 50 thousand years old. Technology used in the manufacture of this bracelet, according to scientists, is not only comparable with today's but probably exceeds them.

The fact that this stone bracelet has a drilled hole, made, most likely, for additional pendant. The diameter of this hole is only seven millimeters and it was not drilled by hand. That is why this artifact scientists jokingly called the "bracelet from the future.

text:
Nazca Plateau.

The Nazca Plateau is crisscrossed with giant patterns. A hummingbird, a monkey, a spider, flowers, a lizard, geometric figures - there are about 30 neat drawings in the same manner in the valley. 

Geoglyphs were discovered almost a century ago, but scientists are still arguing who, how and when created them.  Some believe they are an ancient irrigation system, others believe they are "sacred Inca trails," others claim they are the oldest astronomy textbook on Earth. 

There is one theory, it is a message from aliens. There are many theories, but none are scientifically confirmed.

text:
Scientists have been arguing about the discovery in an ancient castle of knights for years. 

A brooch depicting a radiation sign caused a flurry of theories: there were those who were sure that castles were heated with the help of radiation half-life. In the castle, and later in the surrounding villages, researchers noticed the stoves. Slits on them were also depicted in the form of the sign of radiation.

Such stoves, surprisingly enough, have a rather unusual structure. It makes almost no sense to heat them with coal, the fuel consumption is too high. Many models have no pipes at all, as if they did not need smoke extraction. And on such stoves there is also a marking, which is a good sign. Of course, to say that medieval alchemists somehow incomprehensibly mastered the technology of half-life, science can not. But a radium stove could really heat huge rooms, unlike any fireplace.

text:
According to history, in the 10-14 centuries in Myanmar were built more than 2500 Buddhist pagodas and temples, which successfully survived the world wars and was one of the main tourist attractions. Until a major earthquake struck in 2016.

And then an interesting story begins - the collapsed brick stupa is pierced with rebar. Why to reinforce the brickwork is not clear. More interesting, what was it made of in the 10th century and where did the developed metallurgy come from at that time?

text:
The underground city of Derinkuyu (Turkey).

One of the largest underground settlements in the world was discovered in 1963 This amazing city is carved into the rock and goes under the ground to a depth of about 80 meters, permanently lived here 50 thousand people. 

Underground city included warehouses, kitchens, weapons rooms, animal stables, rooms for schools and dormitories. There were ventilation shafts, water collection wells and more than 500 different secret exits to the surface.

text:
The interest in Mahenjo-Daro reached its peak when it was possible to study the excavated ruins from above. 

There was a trace of an inexplicably powerful wave. The walls and buildings were melted to greenish glass in some places. The skeletons of people were in their natural lifetime poses. Only those in the streets were frozen, their hands covering their faces. All this affected the outcome of the scientists' conclusions.

However, some time later, the verdict was released to the world. Mohenjo-Daro - destroyed by a nuclear explosion. Other scientists who studied the remains of the people also supported this version.

text:
Baigong Tubes

Mysterious iron pipes were discovered in 1966 on Mount Baigongshan, China. Their age is more than 5 thousand years, in those days iron was not smelted in China yet. There is a version of an alien origin of pipes; analysis of their microstructure ruled out the possibility of human involvement in their creation.

text:
The official version of the origin of Baikal is that the lake is of tectonic origin. It is the deepest on the planet.

But studies have revealed a number of structures, which could not be studied by other means before. It was possible to find out that the southern part of the lake has a rather strange relief: the bottom of the depression goes down relatively flat along the eastern shores and very steep along the western shores.

Against the background of these studies, we can assume that the slopes of the depressions are completely unnatural and look more like a quarry excavation.

text:
The figure of the astronaut was first noticed in 1995.

Realizing that questions could not be avoided, Bishop Rodrigo Solanelles of the cathedral said : 
"The decoration of any Catholic church is built in strict accordance with the ecclesiastical canon developed in the early Middle Ages. There simply can be no "pranks" by individual artists - the diocese will never approve a heretical element of decoration." 

According to the priest, these are monsters common in the Middle Ages, of which there are innumerable outside on Catholic churches. They symbolize the devils of hell that one may encounter outside the temple, but there is no way for them to enter the cathedral.

text:
At the end of 2021, an incredibly useful article was published by 38 researchers from different countries with a genomic analysis of more than 80 Etruscans. According to this study, the Etruscans are some steppe people from the East, and their genome is similar to that of the Yamnaya culture on the Volga.

And now a linguistic paradox: according to the official version, the Yamni spoke Indo-European languages, but they did not speak it in Etruria? The Romans, who also spoke Indo-European, distinguished their language from Etruscan.

text:
The mystery of the making of the cup of Lycurgus.

In a British museum there is a unique artifact from the past, the secret of the manufacture of which is shrouded in mystery. This is an ancient cup made of glass - the Cup of Lycurgus.

It has the property to change its color, depending on the light sources and the liquid poured into it. Scientists have concluded that the glass from which it was made was saturated with particles of gold and silver. The size of the particles of these elements does not exceed 40 nanometers.

How did people get this glass and how was this cup made is an unsolved mystery of mankind?

text: With millions of tons of hand-carved stone, the Egyptians had to make mistakes sooner or later. But the stelae, sarcophagi and blocks are perfectly chiseled, the angles are accurate to 1 degree, and the grinding has been preserved for thousands of years. But some of the blocks have marks on them that look like a bolt cutter. Scientists try to ignore them or give out dubious versions about copper and abrasive.

text:
An ancient map of the galaxy.

The galactic disk is a map of our universe, with an exact marking of the solar system, several thousand years old. Scientists could not give an exact answer as to what it was and why it was intended. 

However, they agreed that the shape of this object strongly resembles our galaxy, and the holes left on it correspond to our position in it. Perhaps this is just a bunch of coincidences, but then what is this object?

text:
If the love of the ancients for stone constructions is quite understandable, the way of their extraction makes one puzzle. Those traces that remain on the mountains, stone quarries and megaliths do not give answers to the question "How? The official science explains these traces as a natural phenomenon. 

For example, straight, flat notches in the mountain that are tens of meters long. Weathering? Collapse?

text:
Welding technology was known in the 19th century, but was apparently not as effective as riveting. They fastened everything from pipes to bridges to ships with the same ease as nails to wood. They were somehow melted into even the hardest-to-reach places, even though they were made of steel.

Today, such a perfect connection can only be achieved with a CNC riveting press. But that's difficult and expensive. But how did our ancestors do it?

In the old pictures there is a riveter's tool, to which some kind of hose is attached. Apparently, this device melted the rivet and firmly seated it in the hole of the joint, requiring no helpers, no time, and no effort.

text:
In April 1561 a strange celestial phenomenon was recorded at dawn in Nuremberg. Witnesses noted hundreds of spheres, cylinders, and other strange objects moving chaotically in the sky. People described it as an aerial battle. It was followed by the appearance of a large black triangular object and then, its crash outside the city.

What could it have been if mankind had no flying machines in those days? A more intelligent life form? This fact is officially documented, the documents are in Switzerland, the city of Zurich.

text:
Giant shotguns - shotguns of giants?

In the history of weapons there are huge shotguns, one of the variants of their name is "duckbill" or "goosefoot". Also called the fortress shotguns.

Goose pigeonholes are heavy shotguns of large caliber with long barrels because geese fly higher than ducks and they don't let themselves as close as ducks, so you have to shoot further and bigger shot!

I have doubts that these giant rifles were designed for hunting, and the second name - fortress rifles, suggests a completely different application.

text:
Mysterious Map.

This map was purchased by Chinese collector Liu Gang in 2001 at an antique store in Shanghai for $500. It is dated 1763 but bears the inscription: "This map was drawn by Mo Yi Tong, a Qing dynasty subject, during the reign of Emperor Gong Li in 1763 from an original map of 1418. The Chinese map, however, already shows both Americas. And both coasts, both west and east. And this is 74 years before Columbus arrived there.

text:
Mysterious map of the sky - three moons above the Earth.

In the German state of Saxony-Anhalt, in the town of Nebra, at the end of the 20th century, an amazing product was found on which were depicted three moons. According to some legends the Earth really had three satellites - Lelja, Fatta and Mesyats.

Leela made a complete revolution in 7 days. Phatta in 13 days, Mesyats in 29.5 days. Confirmation of this have been preserved in the myths and legends of various peoples, as well as in the poems of some poets. And here is what is really strange, we have 2 large, obvious traces of collision with celestial bodies on Earth, aren't they our moons?

text:
Historians, archaeologists and scientists are interested in the Zavolzhskaya Wall. Official science does not pay attention to the historical rampart, because it considers that it is the remains of the Russian defensive fortifications against nomads, erected in the 17-18c. 

First, it is calculated how many laborers are needed to build such a 2,000-km-long embankment and the adjacent moat. All the settlers with infants and old people would not have been able to build the rampart in the stated 50 years. At the same time, neither in the archives, nor in the legends is there any information about the erection of a colossal fortification, comparable with the Great Wall of China.

Second, the official scholars claim that the rampart was built by the Russians to protect them from the steppe nomads. But the ditch along it faces west, not east. This means that the builders were not defending against eastern tribes (e.g., Mongol-Tartars or Nogai), but against invasions from the west.

text:
The "Inexplicable" Coin.

This ancient coin was found in 1957 under the ruins of ancient Native Americans in Maine. How is it possible that ancient Vikings traveled from Europe to North America more than 1,000 years ago?

Historians have been baffled, as there is no record of the Vikings traveling such great distances, and even 500 years before Columbus discovered America.

text:
In June 1934, in the rocks near the Texas town of London, archaeologists found an ordinary-looking hammer - 15 centimeters in length, three in diameter. This find was literally embedded in the limestone. The wooden handle of the hammer is petrified on the outside and turned into coal inside. It turns out that this object is older than the rock around it. This means it is about 400 million years old!

Experts believe that because of the London hammer it is necessary to completely rewrite all books on geology. Scientists are not able to explain what the hammer was doing in the rocks, which are at least 400 million years old.

text:
In 2011, during the excavation of a palace in Avaris, Egypt, the remains of 16 human hands, 3,600 years old, were found. 

There is a myth that soldiers cut off the right hands of their enemies to get gold in return. However, it was the bones themselves that attracted attention. The abnormally long bones, compared to a human arm, are clearly visible. Even assuming that the soldiers got a tall man with long bones, how can one explain an entire pit full of such exhibits?

text:
No one has been able to solve this cipher

Not far from CIA headquarters in Langley, Virginia, you can contemplate a statue that has encoded encryption on its surface. This charming sculpture was created by Jim Sanborn to show that anything can be solved and deciphered using ciphers. Of the four parts of the inscription on the sculpture, only the first three have been deciphered. But even the brilliant minds at the CIA could not get to the bottom of it regarding the fourth part.

text:
Until recently, it was considered impossible to extract DNA from mummies because it was believed that embalming destroyed the deoxyribonucleic acid. More recently, however, scientists have been able to develop a new method that allows DNA extraction.

They first tried the method on Neanderthals, and then moved on to mummies. As a result, they got the genes of more than 80 mummies, among which were the pharaohs. Detailed study of the genes shocked the scientific world, because as it turned out - the pharaohs have nothing in common with the Egyptians. Moreover, all ancient Egyptian rulers were Caucasoids.

text:
Pinara. Turkey.

The city of PÄ±nara in Turkey has long troubled archaeologists.

This ancient city was built thousands of years ago directly in the rock - even the exact time of its construction remains a mystery today.

But the most interesting and disturbing for scientists lies in the reasons for its desolation - for a long time it was strong and rich, and then abruptly disappeared from the annals.

What happened? Catastrophe... Mysticism... Or something else...?

text:
In 2016, the gallery of the V.N. Vrubel Museum in Omsk was renovated.

In the photo you can see not only the windows of the first floor, but also the doors, which means that from this buried floor there was supposed to be an exit to the street. If we believe the official versions that it is a basement, then why make a door to the street in the basement, which would rest against the blind ground?

The building had a full first floor with exactly the same door that now adorns the second floor level. Then, for whatever reason, the first floor was filled in and a door was made directly to the second floor. And had it not been for the reconstruction of the building, perhaps no one would have known of its existence.

text:
This unusual column is located in the city of Delhi. Its age is estimated at 1600 years, but despite this, on its surface there is no trace of rust. Surprisingly, it is made of the purest iron.

The lack of traces of corrosion shows the incredible knowledge of ancient craftsmen. However, they were in no hurry to share their secret, so the secret of how to keep iron from rusting remains a secret.

text:
Physicist Lester Hendershot created generators with no visible source of energy, and he was immediately accused of quackery. Lester, by 1960, in addition to two new generators, had produced 56 pages of documentation explaining to humanitarians that the Earth is a giant magnet, capable of delivering hundreds of billions of volts to humanity every day.

After publicly documenting devices explaining how to harness the "power of the Earth" for free and efficiently, Dr. Hochstetter bought the invention and died suddenly in a train wreck. The only other passenger died in the accident.

A few years later, the physicist Hochstetter is found dead in his home, and it is impossible to say whether it was suicide or something else, because for some reason the cause of death was never investigated.

text:
Veterans of the Battle of Borodino.

Photo from 1912. Surviving participants of the war with Napoleon were brought to the anniversary in St. Petersburg. They were all peasants. They retained their sound mind, memory, and capacity for work.  

But, peasants were taken as soldiers only from the age of 21. So, in the photo are old men who are 120 to 130 years old.  Note that some do not even show signs of gray hair. Or are we looking at record-breaking Russian long-livers, or did the events of the war with Napoleon happen later?

text:
Such a "cultural layer" was dug up in India.

Lately, the topic of buried first floors of buildings has been gaining popularity among people of absolutely different occupations, education, and social status. More and more people are beginning to ask questions, and trying to search for answers on their own.

What is this but evidence of a cataclysm? After all, no one in their right mind would bury buildings underground. And this means that something terrible has happened, which, as usual, has been hidden from us.

text:
The photo shows the famous Aswan Obelisk, which is still of interest to scholars of Egyptology.

Its length is 41.8 meters! It was not completed, there are no inscriptions on it, so the exact date of its manufacture has never been established.

But it is interesting in another way. Since the ancient Egyptians began to carve such a monolith, it means that they were going to transport and install it somehow. And then the question arises: how could the monolith, located inside the rock and surrounded by a narrow trench around its perimeter, be separated from the stone massif?

text:
The Bimini Road.

This find was discovered in 1968 off the coast of the Bahamas. A line of rocks forms a breakwater built to protect a prehistoric settlement from the waves.

Scientists say they are man-made structures that are about 19,000 years old, although, according to official history, there were no civilizations at the time.

text:
During the excavations of Arkaim, pottery was found, decorated not only with the usual Slavic patterns, but also with meander.

For many centuries, it has been believed that the meander is an ancient Greek pattern, but the meander patterns found in Siberia date back to about 20,000 years.

I would make assumptions, but historians are very reluctant to touch the subject of ancient civilizations of Siberia.

text:
In 1978, in a 3.75 million year old layer of volcanic ash, a 75-centimeter-long trail of clear footprints was discovered. Human footprints.

Only 3.75 million years ago, there weren't many humans. There were Australopithecines, like the famous "Lucy", which is not much different from chimpanzees. And the height of Australopithecus, and hence the rest of the bones, including the foot, was much smaller than that of modern humans, where would there be 75 cm?

text:
The old maps of America, in all their diversity, show a different geography before the 18th century. All the territories had already been explored, the countries were divided, but they clearly do not agree with the modern ones.

Look at the map: the Andes are shown only south of the south tropic. Look more closely - the rest of the map is incredibly detailed, showing the rivers and the location of many cities, locations, terrain features. What chance is there that the mariners didn't put the high Andes on the map when you can see them even from the ocean?

text:
While drilling a well in the American state of Idaho, a stone human figure was found. However, the strange thing is that it was found in a formation at a depth of about 100m, which, according to archaeological logic, refers to a time when man was not yet in this part of the world.

Another clarification, a bonus - the figure is not considered a fake, but also has not been investigated, all that is said about it, that such a find is impossible in principle. Found in the wrong place and in the wrong place.

text:
On one of the Crimean beaches in Okunevka, human remains are falling out of an eroded clay slope. 

"Local authorities know about the burial ground, but the cemetery is outside the boundaries of settlements and no one has rights to the land" - a question from a purely archeological point of view: what is it? A couple of meters from the surface - so the remains are not that old.

If a cemetery, why are the bodies buried without coffins? And if it's a burial site, then why are the bodies lying scattered, not next to each other, not on top of each other, like in a mass grave? What was the result of such a burial?

text:
In the south of Japan's Izu Peninsula is the Maruyama Quarry. The first thing you notice is the striped workings with herringbone marks inside. A similar pattern can now be seen in modern mines, where they are left by tunneling equipment. But this equipment could not find its way into the narrow tunnels of the Japanese quarry. Hand work? It doesn't leave identical strips with a certain pitch and radius.

The picture is similar in the Chinese Longyu Grottoes, which were cut by the ancient Chinese.

text:
In an old engraving from 1820, in addition to the column 12 years before its installation, we see the building and the arch of the General Staff.

According to the official version, the construction of the building began in 1819, and finished - in 1829. But we see it in its finished form in 1820.
From the height of 36 meters, on top of the structure floats a triumphal chariot, drawn by six horses. They are held back by two soldiers dressed in Roman armor and armed with lances.
In the cart stands the winged Glory, extending a standard over the square with her left hand. In the right hand of the goddess is a laurel wreath.

Everything is Roman in the capital of an Orthodox country. Why should this be so? If the Romans crucified the Orthodox God, Jesus Christ, why are there monuments to the Romans everywhere?

text:
Ancient Map, China.

This map was purchased by Chinese collector Liu Gang in 2001 at an antique store in Shanghai for $500.

It is dated 1763, but bears the inscription: "This map was drawn by Mo Yi Tong, a Qing dynasty subject, during the reign of Emperor Gong Li in 1763 from an original map of 1418.

This is 74 years before Columbus arrived in the New World, but the Chinese map already depicts both Americas. Both the west and east coasts are shown.

text:
Pyramidal structures were discovered at a depth of 600 to 750 meters near Western Cuba (in 2001). According to preliminary estimates of specialists, such structures could have been created more than 10,000 years ago. This area in Cuba was above the water level 10,000 years ago.

These structures have been reconstructed by sonar. They resemble stepped pyramids found in Iran and Iraq. Some scientists are convinced that this is Atlantis.

text:
Anomalies on the surface of the Moon.
 
Some images taken by various satellites show very strange things on the surface of the Moon. It seems that there are artificial structures on the Moon, which vary in size from very tiny, usually parallelepipedic in shape, to "obelisks" at least 1.5 km high.
 
Fans of paranormal phenomena have even "found" among these objects a large castle "hanging" high above the surface of the Moon. All this as if points to an advanced civilization that previously lived on the Moon and allegedly built complex structures.
 
NASA has never refuted these strange theories.

text:
It is believed that elephants in the Americas disappeared with the end of the last glaciation, i.e., about 12,000 years ago. But the elephant was known to the Olmecs, so much so that it was even depicted in figural pottery. Either elephants still lived in the Olmec era, which contradicts the paleozoological data, or the Olmec craftsmen were familiar with African elephants, which contradicts modern historical views.

But the fact remains that it is possible, if not to feel it with hands, then to see it with your own eyes in a museum. Unfortunately, academic science studiously sidesteps such absurd "trifles".

We can definitely conclude that the Karakum and Kyzylkum desert areas were densely populated. There were mountains and cities, rivers and lakes. At the same time, rivers had quite a different direction from the present one.

A map of the northern and western hemisphere in 1583 - South America is connected to Antarctica, the Drake Passage is missing, Africa is in bloom because of the abundance of lakes, the land beyond the Arctic Circle is uncovered by ice, and North America is still connected to Asia (and no visa or Schengen for travel!).

Every fact contradicts official history by tens or hundreds of thousands of years.

text:
The Sumerian texts show that in a very distant time, alien gods established their colony on Earth, which they called Kee. Fifty aliens were first sent to Earth. They were called the Anu-na-ki. They were led by Anu's eldest son, En-ki (lord of Earth). According to the King's List, Enki's reign in Eridu lasted 28,000 years. Subsequently, however, Anu's sterner younger son En-lil (lord of the air) was placed over him. Enlil increased the colony of aliens on Earth, and placed some in Earth orbit:

"Three hundred he placed in the heavenly watch...
And on earth he placed six hundred."

text:
What did you think the natives of Japan looked like?

The Ainu are the most ancient people of the east, who settled on the Japanese islands about 15,000 years ago.
In the mid-nineteenth century, during the Meiji reforms, the Japanese began to suppress traditional Ainu culture. Women were forbidden to get ritual tattoos and wear national clothes, men were forced to shave their beards. The ban affected rituals and the Ainu language. From that point on, their culture began to fade. They did not preserve their own language; the last Sakhalin resident who spoke Ainu died in 1994.

text:
In Delhi, in the courtyard of the Qutb Minar mosque, there is a metal column known to the world as the "Indra Column.

For several thousand years it has withstood the effects of the weather without a trace of rust.

The column is made of atomic iron without carbon and sulfur impurities at the molecular level. Nowadays it is possible to obtain such perfectly pure iron by sputtering only in a vacuum and only in small quantities. The height of Indra's Pillar corresponds to a three-storey house; moreover, the Pillar goes into the Earth for several tens of meters.

It is not clear how, with the help of what mechanisms this miracle was made and installed.

Comparing the dimensions with a human height of 185cm, the keyhole, door handle and windows appear to be perfectly suited to the use of a creature exactly twice as tall.
