text:
The Chulpa towers are considered to be ancient Inca burial towers. It is not for me to judge the tastes of different peoples as to where they wanted to find their final resting place, it is a matter of taste. A pyramid to some, a dovina to others, a twelve-meter polygonal masonry tower to others.

In the official version only one detail embarrasses me - according to results of the analyses, the towers are several centuries older than Incas. It turns out that the Incas buried the dead in already existing structures, and we do not know about their real purpose.

In the Indian city of Puri stands the temple of Jagannatha in the 11th century. We won't go into detail about how the 65-meter-high structure survived earthquakes and time, but the dome of the temple definitely needs attention. 

Once again - a stone temple, 65m high, and topped with a monolithic structure weighing 20.000 tons. With that kind of weight modern construction technology does not mess with, if anything, is impractical.

Does anyone have any idea what kind of cranes were used in the 11th century to haul this thing to the top of the temple?

text:
The real dimensions of the Indian Ocean.

The map that Ptolemy made in the 2nd century according to "their" calculus, according to official history. Note the size of the Indian Ocean Sea, it is as big as 5-6 Mediterranean Seas. 

Someone will ask, "How can you believe some old maps out there?"
Answer. Some of the lands known to us are depicted on these maps accurately enough, which means that this chart was made from the air, the only possible way to map the terrain, the topography.

The second interesting point is that it is impossible to sail around Africa, which is confirmed by sailors, and there is no evidence to the contrary - no one has sailed around Africa.

text:
This unusual boulder is located in Wyoming (USA), and in narrow circles of "initiates" (among climbers), this place is quite famous - there is one of the extreme routes to the cliffs Dihedrals (Dihedrals Wall).
In translation sounds like "Falling Block" (Falling Block) or "Cube". 

There is little information about it. But what you can see on the photo is quite admirable: the huge size - the height of the block is about 23 meters (75 feet), two fairly flat facets are located almost at 90 degrees, and strange parallel grooves indicate the traces of machining.

text:
A map with the continents of Liberia and Asgard.

Strange as it may seem, Hitler was convinced of the existence of more advanced civilizations of the past, and wanted to find the knowledge and technology of the past.

But the most interesting thing begins after the Germans visited Tibet and the monks, who supposedly had something to tell them about past civilizations.

Immediately afterwards, the Ahnenerbe headed for Antarctica, and judging by documents and maps, they tried to get into the hollow part of the Earth through a passage in the glaciers. To what extent this succeeded is unknown, as is whether or not anything can be found there at all.

But purely for coincidence, it is strange that right after Tibet, Hitler became interested in Antarctica, and together with the maps headed for the mysterious continent. In any case, it is impossible to know the truth.

It is hard to assume that an official document, which is said to be "as accurate as a ship's logbook," could accidentally lose an extra thousand years.

text:
The building of the Theater Museum in Moscow was built in 1896. So it is believed.

But look, in the 1900 photo, the house looks like a normal buried house, the first floor is partially filled in. Version of a cultural layer will not work here - what "cultural layer" for 4 years? That janitor in the photo was sweeping the roadway so much that he accidentally "dug up" the first floor? And in comparison with modern photos, for 120 years, the "cultural layer" has not grown at all.

It does not look like a real basement floor: the entrance to the building was not arranged through it, the walls semi-basement floors have always made thicker to withstand the pressure of the soil, low windows in the winter snow, and in the rain may flood the water, which is completely illogical in design.

text:
The National Archives of France has posted an atlas from 1556 and it would be all right if it were not for a number of strange details.

The atlas has a fairly detailed map of Antarctica, not only without the ice shell, but it is also connected to Eurasia and marked with river channels. The very fact that the mainland outlines of the southern continent were drawn before 1556 is thought-provoking.

text:
In the Primorsky region, Chistovodnoye village, there is a Park of Dragons (City of Dragons) - a natural rock park of amazing and monumental stone formations.

It is very difficult and probably impossible to imagine that in a granite monolith by natural way, weathering or any other way the nature managed to leave a mark like this imprint of a human foot (its size is almost human height - more than 1.5 meters).

text:
In the Russian State Archive of Ancient Acts (which are digitized, but accessible only by permission. Surprise!) we found a document with the inventory of the search of the headman of the Vodskaya Pyatina at the mouth of the Neva. "Earlier he was not published and was not involved in the study of pre-Petrine Petersburg" - it would seem, what pre-Petrine Petersburg, and what is there to search on the marshes?

The document says about the search on May 25, 7108 (year 1600), made by order of tsar Boris Godunov and tsar Vasily Shuisky, and describes the presence of a ship wharf, a guest house and a church. Only for 1615 there came here 16 ships from Vyborg, Ivangorod, Ladoga, Narva, Novgorod, Norrkoping, Revel and Stockholm. The inhabitants of the marshes didn't settle too badly, did they?

text: "Throughout history there have been many rulers who could be described as eccentric, to say the least. They have resorted to the aid of strange schemes, experiments, and pure weirdness, giving a certain tinge of history, to put it mildly. Among these rulers were both geniuses and madmen. Stories about them never fail to entertain and fascinate. One such eccentric historical figure was the great King of Prussia, who created a bizarre army of giants that had no equal in the world..."

text:
The Maya Train is a major railroad project (1,472 kilometers) that will take tourists to the Yucatan Peninsula during the day and be used to transport goods at night. During construction, the media erupted with photos of figurines depicting extraterrestrial beings embraced by a typical Mayan.

While people argue whether the figurines are real or not, the National Foundation for Tourism Development got away with a short statement "Fake. The images are made of modern materials, despite the presence of Mexican symbols as well as those of Peru."

What about radiocarbon analysis? Metallography, spectral analysis, stone structure determinations? These seem to be the very analyses that allow you to tell if you have found an ancient artifact or if you are a victim of forgers. Fake or not, where is the research?

Briefly about how the scientific community works.

text:
In April, while digging a fountain in Vladivostok, workers discovered an underground tunnel. The procedure in such cases has long been defined - archaeologists and historians are sent to the site, construction is suspended. 

But the situation turned into a scandal, and it was not possible to preserve the historical heritage - the workers destroyed the find before the arrival of specialists. Article 7.14.1 by the way. The historical discovery is now destroyed together with the tunnel, and frankly, the situation is not good! I do not even know what is worse - falsification of history or its intentional destruction.

text:
A model of an unknown city in stone.

There are many mysteries with this find. A unique thing for ancient times. A real 3D model of an ancient city. And scientists have not been able to determine what kind of city it depicts. At the moment, almost everything connected with this find remains a mystery. There is no mention of the layout in ancient sources, its age is impossible to determine what city it depicts too.

The layout is carved from granite, and this indicates the great capabilities of its creators, for it requires appropriate tools for processing. The question remains and how the ancient Indians were able to depict the city in volumetric model? To achieve such accuracy is necessary to look at the city from a great height, and for this you need equipment.

Did the ancient Indians have such knowledge? If so, where did they come from? And if not, then who built this model, when and for what purpose?

The most surprising thing is that most of the artifacts depict fantastic pictures, going against the official versions of history. Maybe that's why scientists are studiously ignoring them?

text:
On our planet, on every continent, you can find a huge variety of places supposedly created by nature, which are very reminiscent of modern mines and quarries. The first picture is of Mount Watkins. There, excavations of rock on a huge scale that nature cannot create are all too obvious. This particular place is very popular, in terms of possible ancient quarries. Let's compare. Below is a photo with the traces of a rotary excavator. Does it look like?

Scientists mistake places like this for natural formations. And there are a lot of such places on Earth. It seems to me that in the past, the Earth was mined as best they could, and now the same thing goes on. Only when this civilization existed, unfortunately, one can only guess.

text:
The interest in Mahenjo-Daro reached its peak when it was possible to study the excavated ruins from above.

There was a trace of an inexplicably powerful wave. The walls and buildings were melted to greenish glass in some places. The skeletons of people were in their natural lifetime poses. Only those in the streets were frozen, their hands covering their faces. All this affected the outcome of the scientists' conclusions. For about two years after the study, the data was not made public. 

However, some time later, the verdict was released to the world. Mohenjo-Daro - destroyed by a nuclear explosion. Other scientists who studied the remains of the people also supported this version.

text:
How did ancient animals get into stone layers and stay there with their entire carcasses, if the layers accumulate gradually?

Not a single fossilized body of a large dinosaur has been found. Only bones. But fossils of sea creatures of that time are found. There is speculation that the dinosaurs died in the waters of the hot flood and boiled away, leaving only skeletons, and sea creatures fell into the clay cold masses of that massive cataclysm (turbidites).

Geology and anthropology do not explain this fact of the ancient animals and plants in the stone at all. They are petrified and that is all. It is not that simple and geochronology by strata does not work here. Organics became stone inside the rock and in the water, just like trees.

text:
"Waffle Rock," located on the shore of Lake Jennings Randolph. There seems to be nothing special about it, but if you look closely at the outlandish, regular geometric pattern, many questions arise. The imprint on the rock is controversial, whether it is a geological formation or a remnant of ancient technology. According to some scientists, this huge piece of rock could have originated 300 million years ago.

Those who have seen the rock are confused by its construction and composition. The lines are so parallel and so smoothly polished that it is hard to imagine that it could have been produced by natural phenomena. To this day, no one knows for certain for what purpose, by what or by whom this structure was created. Everyone offers their own theory, trying to explain the incredible origin of this piece of stone.

text:
How did people centuries ago manage to build such gigantic structures and without technology?

The ancient temple of Kailas (in Ellora, India) was carved into the rock stone by stone. By handðŸ¤² of course.
The dimensions of the courtyard are 82 by 46 meters at the base, and 30 meters high.

The structure is a freestanding tiered temple complex of 2,000 square meters. It took the Hindus of the Rashtrakuta Empire twenty years to build the temple, processing 200,000 tons of rock. This means that 27 tons of rock must be processed per day. 

In addition to this temple, there are 33 rock sculptures carved into the same rock. They are, of course, carved by hand.

text:
God, gods, or goddess?

The Old Testament preaches strict monotheism and states that God is Father in the singular and masculine. The Bible contradicts itself. 

One of the names of the Creator is Elohim. But this word in Hebrew is plural. That is, not God, but Gods. In addition, the Bible mentions other Elohim, with whom God speaks and assures them that they are mortal, like humans. That is, he himself is mortal, like an ordinary human being, which he most likely was. 

The gender is no less of a mystery. The Holy Spirit in Hebrew, "Ruach," is a feminine word. Saint Anselm of Canterbury refers to God the Creator as the Great Mother in his books, and the Church does not consider his writings to be heresy.

text:
Petrified trees in Arizona

Think about it - a tree turned into a semi-precious stone. To do this, it had to be buried under a layer of earth, without access to oxygen, to absorb certain minerals under the influence of enormous temperatures and, at the same time, not to rot or burn.

What could create such conditions? A global catastrophe (the fall of a meteorite or other celestial body) or a war of ancient civilizations described, for example, in the Mahabharata?

text:
According to historians, 200 years ago Alexander's column, weighing 600-700t, manually raised for 1.45 hours. 

These days in Astana, the support for the tent "Khan Shatyr", weighing 1500t, was lifted by the best engineers of our time for 2 days.

It is a shame to spend years in studies and weeks for calculations, to organize the work of the best specialists of various colors and a heap of special vehicles, and then to read that you were surpassed by a dozen of peasants and horses?

text:
Once again about the warm climate and the reptilian Rus'. The Galitsko-Volynsky Chronicle, 1200, a record very strangely praises Roman of Galicia, describing his memorable moral and military qualities :

"He was angry as a lynx, and ruined as a corcodile."

Chronicler would be wary of inventing such things about his beloved prince. Then for the lies and unflattering epithets could be repaid with his life - morals are harsh, the imagination is rich. But the reptile would not have taken root here, if only the climate were warmer...

text:
Traces of a civilization that disappeared before the pharaohs were discovered in the Nile Delta

Archaeological mission of the Egyptian Supreme Council of Antiquities during excavations in the area of Koam El Hiljian in Egypt's Dahalia province discovered 83 tombs dating back to the first half of the fourth millennium BC.

The discovery was reported by the Egypt Independent. It was made in the Nile Delta, near Alexandria. The city of Butoh was located there, after the name of which the local ancient civilization was also named.

According to Mustafa Vaziri, secretary general of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, archaeologists discovered 83 burials of the Butoh civilization. The graves are oval pits. It is noteworthy that the buried were not laid on their backs, as is common in most funerary practices. All the dead were buried squatting or lying on their sides in the fetal position.

text:
Secrets of history: Was Gagarin the first?

Conspiracy theorists claim that at least twelve people were sent into space from 1957 to 1961, and all of them never returned.

According to the Cordiglia brothers, amateur radio operators from Italy, they picked up a signal from space on February 4, 1961. Allegedly, heavy human breathing was heard on the audio recording. The Cordiglia brothers are certain it was a Soviet cosmonaut. According to them, the recording was made two months before Yuri Gagarin's flight.

One of the brothers, Achille Cordilla, claims that their equipment allowed them to intercept signals from Soviet and U.S. spacecraft.

Surprisingly, according to the archives, it was on February 4, 1961 that the Soviet Union tried to send a spacecraft to Venus. The launch was unsuccessful. Due to the failure of the upper stage, the rocket was only able to launch into Earth orbit. It circled the earth a few times and burned up in the atmosphere. This accident was not reported anywhere.

text:
There are many versions about the origin of the Moon. Some of them are so unbelievable that they seem like nonsense

Below is perhaps the craziest theory that our satellite is artificial. 

1. The satellite always faces the same side of the Earth. In addition, the reverse side is very different from the visible side by its roughness. If the moon is a natural body, this should not be the case.
2. The diameter of the Moon is 1/395 of the diameter of the Sun, and the distance between the Moon and the Earth is 1/395 of the distance between the Earth and the Sun. Nature again?
3. Almost all lunar craters are circular. This means that the asteroids hit the surface at right angles. 
4. The moon reflects light at the full moon with the entire surface of the disk. According to the laws of optics, the edges of the disk should be dim and barely visible. The angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection - this law of optics is violated by the Moon.

In general, both peoples were right, and now I wonder how two identical horned figures got from Azerbaijan to America?

text:
Global floods have occurred more than once on Earth. Incredible hydrostatic shocks caused by the pole shift periodically devastate vast areas. And there is plenty of evidence for this.

In Hungary, at a depth of 60 meters in an open sand pit have been found the stumps of cypresses in diameter from 4 to 8 meters. What is remarkable, the safety of these stumps is perfect and the wood is not hardened. It means that it was not so long ago. 

No other trees were found anywhere in the quarry. And these stand in a bunch - the rest were pulled away by the hydro-sand mudflow.

Science said it happened 20 million years ago. And even the wood was preserved - isn't that a miracle?

text:
Gebekli Tepe

It is traditionally believed that the development of religion became possible only after mankind mastered agriculture. That is, in order to begin building temples, people first had to settle near their crops. But excavations in the Turkish town of Gebekli Tepe may change the picture. On this hill are the remains of the oldest religious building known to mankind. It was built 5000 years before Stonehenge. At this time, as previously thought, pottery was not even known in the Middle East, and hunter-gatherers were running across the steppe for antelope and roe deer. To build this temple complex required the organized work of thousands of people. And they needed something to feed them, so they would not run away from the construction site in search of sprouts and apples. It is possible that people began to sow crops nearby, just to feed this rabble of builders.

text:
The Real Unbreakable

Filed under "Real Super People."
An unnamed family from the U.S. state of Connecticut has been the center of much research by geneticists because of their unusually high bone density, much like Bruce Willis' character in the movie "Unbreakable." 

The family has a genetic mutation that means their bones never break, even when seriously injured. Scientists tested 20 family members, and half of them were found to have extra-dense bones. It is hoped that by studying these people's DNA, researchers will be able to better understand the factors that affect bone density, which in turn may lead to a treatment for osteoporosis.

text:
The Founder of Dubai on the Future of his Country

The founder of Dubai, Sheikh Rashid, was once asked about the future of his country, and this was his answer: 

"My grandfather rode a camel, my father rode a camel, I drove a Mercedes, my son drove a Land Rover and my grandson drives a Land Rover, but my great-grandson will drive a camel..."

Why is this so?

"Hard times breed strong people. Strong people create good times.
Good times give birth to weak people. Weak people create hard times."

Many won't understand, but you have to raise warriors, not parasites.

Death of Marilyn Monroe

It is believed that the main sex symbol of the 20th century did not commit suicide because of depression, but was murdered on the orders of the Kennedy brothers. 

The actress first had an affair with John, and then, when it became clear that Mr. President would not leave his wife Jacqueline, with his brother Senator. 

Eventually Marilyn declared that she would tell the world about her relationship with both of them. Kennedy took this threat seriously and allegedly contacted the star's personal psychiatrist, who contributed to her death.

A mysterious civilization in India

Scientists have discovered in the Indian state of Maharashtra rock art 10,000 years old, created by representatives of an unknown civilization to science.

Petroglyphs were found in the vicinity of 52 villages, but residents only five of them knew about the existence of these objects.Experts were struck by the great diversity of subjects drawings. Ancient authors depicted animals, birds, people and geometric figures.

"Our first assumption after studying these petroglyphs is that they were created around 10,000 years B.C.," Teas Garj, director of Maharashtra's Department of Archaeology, told the BBC

Baigong Tubes

The age of the find has been estimated to be more than 5,000 years, which is older than the beginning of iron production in China. There are theories that the pipes were laid by aliens, because microstructural analysis showed that they were not made by human hands.

The powerful took part in this action. More horrible things have happened in Bohemian Grove. The club was seriously guarded on all sides. After Alex Johnson, no strangers have been allowed into the club.

text:
The Mystery of the Missing Submarine K-129.

The Soviet strategic nuclear-armed submarine disappeared without a trace in 1968 while carrying out combat missions off the U.S. coast. 
The search for the missing submarine yielded no results, and the entire crew of 98 was declared missing. 
This episode is considered the most mysterious and closed in the Soviet submarine fleet. The exact cause of the disaster is unknown to this day.

Documentary: "Missing Submarine. The tragedy of K-129" describes this incident in great detail.

text:
Mysterious signal: the human brain is capable of transmitting an encoded signal unknown to science

A unique type of signal has been found in the human brain that scientists knew nothing about before. It represents a unique form of cellular connections. This discovery was called amazing, it allows us to understand that the brain is a much larger computational machine than previously thought.

Patients diagnosed with epilepsy were involved. Using fluorescence microscopy, they were able to identify individual cells in the cerebral cortex that use a combination of positively charged ions to form calcium dendritic actions. The human brain is often compared to a computer: both use the force of electrical voltage to perform various operations. The computer receives current through electrical wires.

text:
The Medieval Image of Mickey Mouse

The official birth of Mickey Mouse is considered to be the day when "Steamboat Willie" was shown on the screens in 1928. It was in this cartoon viewers first saw the beloved later hero. And who in his right mind would say that the cartoon could draw over 700 years ago? And yet it's true.

It is as true as the fact that along with the famous island of Malta, there is a town of the same name in Austria. It was there, during the works on restoration of the local church, where the drawing of the mouse was found.

So, let's get into details. In Malta, an Austrian city, which is located in the federal state of Carinthia, there is a little church. It was built in the 13th century and is dedicated to the Blessed Virgin Mary. Not so long ago, the local authorities decided to carry out repairs in the religious building, because of its rather respectable age.

text:
Leonardo's Leicester Codex

The Leicester Codex is a notebook of scientific notes made by Leonardo da Vinci in Milan in 1506-1510. The manuscript consists of 18 sheets of paper, scribed on both sides, that make up a 72-page notebook. 

Leonardo's notes are written in his own mirror handwriting, which is the only way to read them. The notes focus on the various phenomena about which Leonardo pondered: why the moon shines, how and why water flows in rivers, where fossils come from, what minerals are made of, and so on. 

The notebook also contains many mathematical calculations, diagrams, and drawings. 

In 1994, the codex was put up for auction, in which it was purchased by Microsoft founder Bill Gates for $30.8 million.

text:
The Barabar cave system in India. 200 to 300 B.C. 

The caves are carved in gneiss, as hard as granite. Vaults, floors, and ceilings are polished to a shine. The acoustics and ventilation of the caves are ideal. There are reservoirs for water and hermetic closing of the doorways. There is a version that the caves were used in ancient times as a bomb shelter. The vaults are capable of withstanding a nuclear strike. Ancient skeletons with high levels of radiation are often found in the vicinity.

text:
No famous legend is without mentioning giants.

In the famous English fairy tale "Jack and the Beanpot" giants lived among the clouds, the ancient Greeks kept the sky on their shoulders and fought with the gods, Lemuel Gulliver visited North America, where giants lived, and was himself such a midget, the Japanese considered the first Europeans demonic giants "they", and Canadians and Americans have invented a fabulous hero - a giant woodcutter Paul Bunyan.

How did people on different continents get similar legends about giants? It is quite possible that they are the remnants of memories of ancient civilizations. Medieval Danish historian Saxon Grammaticus (1150-1220) suggested that giants really did exist - otherwise how to explain the cyclopean structures of antiquity?
And the brain is so constructed that it cannot generate what it is not familiar with. 
People are incapable of making up a tale of non-existent phenomena without any background information.

text:
According to the official version, the human race came from Africa, where the remains of the first Homo Naledi humans were discovered. It was in Africa 270,000 years ago that modern humans appeared. 

But a study of the vertebrae of one of the extinct human species, 1.5 million years old, puts the hypothesis of African origin of humans in doubt. It states that humans began migrating to Eurasia millions of years ago (even before Homo Sapiens appeared). The simple conclusion from this study is that Homo sapiens could have evolved not only in Africa, but also on any other continent.

text:
The Kvarkush Plateau is located on the border of the Perm region and the Sverdlovsk region at an altitude of more than 1,000 m. Who expects to see the usual landscape of the mountain tundra will be pleasantly surprised by stone placers. 

These "natural formations" do not simply resemble artificially hewn stones with their smooth faces and cuts, but also bear traces of sawing... 

How did this stone end up in a remote and inaccessible mountainous area? If the next expert from academic history tries to explain these traces by the ancient activities of the known to science Uralic peoples, let him first repeat such a thing with primitive copper tools.

text:
The Italian pyramid of Bomarzo can be considered an uncomfortable find. The megalithic structure was discovered back in 1911, of course, it was not explored. In 2008 the pyramid was rediscovered by local resident Salvatore Foschi, it was cleaned by ordinary enthusiasts, but archaeologists and historians never showed attention to it.

The reason is simple - it is not clear, in what historical epoch to "put" it, in fact the history of the Roman empire is painted literally on months and about a pyramid there is not a word. By its design and form the find does not fit into the generally accepted ancient history of Italy. It was decided to attribute the megalith to the Etruscan era and call it by the traditionally vague universal term - altar.

"A very interesting find. We don't plan to study it, of course."

By its design and form the find does not fit into the generally accepted ancient history of Italy. It was decided to attribute the megalith to the Etruscan era and call it by the traditionally vague universal term - altar.

"A very interesting find. We don't plan to study it, of course."
Forbidden Science

text:
Ivan Fedorovich Afremov in his "Historical Review of the Tula Province" in 1850 described the obvious-unbelievable:

"From underground forces of fire, the famous earthquakes were:
On October 14, 1802 the buildings shook and the crockery fell down from the tables; in Kaluga, Likhvin and Kozelsk the bells rang by themselves; on January 11, 1838 the earthquake lasted about a minute, and in both cases the earthquake was from the south to the north...".

It is unreal to explain the earthquake in Tula with any decent scientific explanation - the city is outside the seismic active zone and so far from it that even the echoes of the nearest earthquakes are not always detectable with the devices. And suddenly, bells ring, buildings sway and crockery falls... Evidence of these earthquakes is plentiful, but there are still no explanations.

text:
With millions of tons of hand-cut stone in Egypt, chipping and errors would have been inevitable, but there are none. But there are traces that look like a bolt cutter and the finest cuts in the stone, which are impossible with a hand saw.

Historians sometimes try to repeat the work of the Egyptians with hand tools, but their result is not even close in quality and speed to what we see in museums and in Egypt itself. When the stories about the use of copper and abrasives begin, everything rests in a simple mathematics - for creation of one sarcophagus in 100 tons it is necessary so much copper, how many Egyptians have not dug out in all their history (and there are 2 tens of such sarcophagi).

text:
Dwarves, fairies, and subterranean dwarfs are not fairy tales!

Stories about gnomes, fairies, and subterranean dwarfs are nowadays perceived as fairy tales. Although until the 18th century, it was not surprising to travelers and local peoples that creatures of small stature lived near them.

The settlement of Skara Brae was dug up in Scotland after a hurricane in the 1920s. The settlement was founded before 3100 B.C. and had existed for about 600 years. The stone walls, beds, ceilings and doorways were designed for occupants up to one meter tall.

In size, the people copied Egyptian, Italian and Slavic dwarfs, and in Britain itself, dwarves, elves, fairies and leprechauns make up a huge part of the cultural heritage. And now the archaeological part as well.

text:
Rani Ki-Wav is an amazing structure.

Rani Ki-Wav is a very complex structure, a multistage well, which is located in the city of Patan in India. It is 64 m long, 20 m wide and 24 m deep. It is believed to have been built in the 11th century. However, archaeological work here almost never happened, because for many years the well was flooded by the Saraswati River and as a result all covered with silt. 

Only at the end of the XX century began to clear it. Looking at what has been cleared, we see that Rani Ki-Wav is not only a work of art, but also a testimony to the incredible technology of the past.

text:
Many manifestations of the UFO phenomenon have been observed throughout human history, beginning in ancient times, as mentioned in various ancient and medieval sources. Of particular interest are the events that took place over the French city of Nice in August 1608. 

Everything began on August 5, when about eight o'clock in the evening in the sky above the city appeared three flat objects in the form of an elongated oval. They hovered over the fortress at first, then descended to the water and began to maneuver slowly. According to witnesses, the water under the objects began to boil and yellow-orange steam began to rise from its surface. And all this was accompanied by a terrible rumble.

It seems that they were obviously looking for something. In addition, for some unknown reason drops of red were falling from the sky the entire following week, which horrified the people of the city.

text:
The photos from Mars taken by the rovers showed a real shell, just like on Earth. The photos themselves were taken back in 2014, but the strange object has only now been noticed by bloggers. In the photo - the slope of a small hill, and in this slope "embedded" something that strikingly resembles the Earth "houses for snails. In general, if you do not know that this is happening on Mars, you might think that somewhere in the Earth's desert another fossil was found. 

The shell most closely resembles ammonites. Such shells are found all over the globe. Is it a random fossil or is it really a snail print? What do you think?

These petroglyphs are in Pakistan, in the Indus Valley. Once there was a highly developed Indo civilization in these places, not inferior to the Egyptian and Mesopotamian civilizations. It is from that civilization that these ancient images carved on the stones remained. Look closely - doesn't it seem to you that these are mysterious vimanas - flying chariots from ancient Indian myths?

By the way, in the near future, the petroglyphs will be deep under water because of the construction of a dam in these places.

It can be assumed that this is not the only book describing space technology.

text:
Scientists from NASA have discovered a strange square iceberg in Antarctica, the size of which is still difficult to assess, making the assumption that its diagonal is more than one and a half kilometers, reports LiveScience. Experts say that only about ten percent of the iceberg is on the surface, with the rest hidden underwater.

According to Kelly Brant of NASA, the formation of icebergs of this shape is a fairly common phenomenon. The blocks of ice that build up near the shelf and break away under their own weight have a regular rectangular shape, the scientist said.

Only I do not quite believe in such explanations. More precisely - do not believe it at all. An ice parallelepiped looks very strange. As if someone sawed it with a giant hacksaw.

text:
In 1940, in Panama, an unusual find was made in the form of an animal resembling a dragon with a pinion of unknown purpose on its tail.

By the way, the "seat" of the figurine is made of emerald, which is a difficult material to process. Although the figure itself is not easy to create, because of the elaboration of small elements and details.

They have estimated the artifact at 2500-3000 years, but the most important thing is the tail. The purpose of the gear on the tail could not be explained, but it is uncharacteristic for findings of the past element.

According to one version, the figure is a small copy of an allegedly large machine of the distant past, which could cut stone. The version is doubtful, but on the example of "Inca planes", we can say that anything is possible.

Klaas Visscher's 1657 map  is a reprint of Petrus Caerius' 1614 map. Remember the maps of America, where even after exploring the territories of California travelers and cartographers were sure that it was an island and it had no connection with the mainland?

The Man in the Iron Mask 

In 1669, Louis XIV's minister sent a letter to the prison about the arrival of a special prisoner. The "black sheep" of noble families were placed in this prison.

The imprisonment lasted until the prisoner's death in 1703

Lady Granny. 

One of the most mystifying details of the Kennedy assassination is the presence in the photographs of a certain woman, dubbed Lady Granny. 

This woman was caught in a bunch of pictures, showing that she had a camera and was filming what was going on. 

The FBI tried to find her and identify her, but to no avail. She remained a mystery.

text:
The War of 1858-1860, about which textbooks are silent.

Another refutation of the myth of Russian drunkenness - the most powerful anti-alcohol riots, which no other country in the world knew. 

In 1858-1859 anti alcohol riot covered 32 provinces (which include Saratov), more than 2,000 villages and villages rose against the forcible drinking of the nation.

People smashed drinking establishments, breweries and wineries, refused free vodka. The people demanded that "the taverns should be closed and they should not be seduced." The tsarist government dealt with the rebels in the cruelest manner. In prisons on "drinking affairs" went 111 thousand peasants, about 800 were brutally beaten with spitzrutens and exiled to Siberia.

From July 24 to 26, 37 drinking houses were broken up in Volsky County, and for each of them the peasants were charged heavy fines to rebuild the taverns.

text:
The Man from Somerton 

In 1948, the body of a man was found on Somerton Beach in Australia. He had no identification on him, no wallet, and his face was clean-shaven. There was not a single clue. 

With the deceased found a piece of paper torn from an edition of Omar Khayyam, on it was written two words - Tamam Shud. These words are translated from Persian as "finished".

The victim remained unidentified.

text:
Ancient Conquerors of Heaven.

The story began in 1875, when in one of the ancient Indian temples was discovered a treatise called Vimanika Shastra, written in the Brahmanical language, Sanskrit. 

It was not its age (it was written 2,400 years ago) that made this document famous, but its content. The author of the manuscript, the scholar Bharadwaja Maharishi, described the types of flying machines and their construction. And with the caveat that it was a compilation from older sources.

At the end of the 19th century, this book was considered mythological because aviation was still in its infancy. But modern scientists, having studied "Vimanika Shastra" have unequivocally declared that this work has no relation to fairy tales, it is competently written technical work.

The trouble is that the names of some of the metals and liquids needed to lift flying machines still cannot be translated

text:
Anomaly of the Baltic Sea

In 2011, the Swedish Ocean X team discovered a strange object at the bottom of the Baltic Sea. The media speculated that the object was a sunken UFO. 

It turned out that there was a giant glacier in the area. And the object appeared due to the debris of rocks that went together with the glacier. 

Here they settled, forming a bizarre object after the glacier melted.

text:
The Twin Towers and the Strange Coincidence  

The World Trade Center towers had long since become unprofitable by the time of the attack. There had been projects to demolish the buildings, but a certain businessman, Larry Silverstein, appeared in the story. He was willing to buy the towers, but could not pay the full amount at once. For this reason, on July 23, 2001, a deal was made to lease the structures for 99 years and Larry paid about $30 million.

Silverstein immediately insured the towers for 3.5 billion dollars, and the contract separately stipulated the case of a terrorist attack.

On September 11, 2001, Larry Silverstein and his daughter were not injured in the attacks. Larry liked to eat breakfast every day at WTC-1 and his daughter worked there, but they did not attend that day.
A jury subsequently found the terrorist attacks on the WTC towers on September 11, 2001 to be two separate insurance claims.

text:
On August 18, 1953 Svyatogorsk monastery was closed to the public.
On that day, restoration of Pushkin's tomb was underway. 

Two human skulls and bones were found in the chamber under the monument. The examination showed that the bones belonged to elderly people. Obviously, the skulls did not get here by accident. Burying the skulls in a special chamber above the crypt is part of the cult ritual, which is called the "Dead Head. Most likely a ritual murder of unknown people was committed.

The "Dead Head" is an important Masonic symbol. It participates in the rite of admission to the first apprenticeship degree and its transition to the subsequent degrees. She also escorts a dead brother to the next world. Masons depicted the dead head on tombstones and placed skulls in the grave.

It is known that Pushkin was hereditary Freemason. Members of the lodge were his father and his uncle - Vasily Lvovich.
Researchers are ashamed to touch this subject.

text:
Arecibo's answer?

This is a radio signal that was sent in 1974 from the Arecibo Observatory. The language chosen was a mathematical binary code. 

It was sent into space to the globular star cluster M13, 25,000 light years away.

But here's the interesting thing: in 2001, an image appeared on the ground near the Chilbolton Observatory that looked exactly like Arecibo's message.

text:
Recently a sensational news spread in the scientific community - "new unknown civilization" was found in Central Asia. 

Read the details: "For the first time traces found by an amateur archaeologist, General Komarov in 1885. In 1904, his excavations were continued by an American Pompelli and a German Schmidt...".

The novelty of the discovery lies in the fact that academic science was actively glossing over the "inconvenient" facts that did not fit into the already available official picture of the past. After more than a hundred years, there were so many facts and discoveries that it became impossible to ignore them and unreal to attribute them to already discovered civilizations. We had to acknowledge. after more than a hundred years.

text:
If a fossil is found in more than one geologic stratum it is called a "polystrate fossil. For example, fossilized trees through several layers are found in the United States, Canada, England, France, Germany and Australia.

Scientists say this kind of thing happens when instances of rapid sediment accumulation are replaced by a period of slow accumulation. Translated from the official language, it's a slump or a dip. But here's what's wrong with this scholarly logic - after rapid rock accumulation, the part of the tree left in the air should begin to undergo decay or simply rot. In the case of polystrate fossils, however, the entire trunk of the tree is one preserved tree. Doesn't that confuse scientists?

text:
Why do I constantly criticize academic history and cabinet scientists? For the lazy approach to dating and the stubborn desire to shove any finding and discovery into the generally accepted history by any means. 

During excavations at Pepi Pyramid 2, archaeologists stumbled upon a perfectly worked lid from a sarcophagus. Later they found the sarcophagus itself split open, but even destroyed it was a magnificent example of stone workmanship. 

What do historians do? They attribute the find to the Egyptians during the reign of Pepi 2, only because the sarcophagus was found next to his pyramid. A great way to determine the age, highly scientific!

text:
The Shroud of Turin is probably the most famous Christian... fake. On the canvas, supposedly, a negative image of a man and blood stains are printed. 

However, in 1988, radiocarbon analysis showed that it was created around 1260-1390. One analysis could be wrong, but forensic experts also expressed their opinion - the bloodstain prints could have been left by someone who was sitting in different positions, rather than lying flat.

text:
There are thousands of discrepancies in the various canons of Christianity (Catholic, Jewish, Protestant, Coptic) that treat the events of the Bible stories differently. For example, Daniel is a prophet to Rome, a false prophet to Jerusalem, and a "forger" to Protestants.

I couldn't agree more with the Protestants. Reading through the events of the Book of Daniel one stumbles upon geographical illiteracy and errors in historical facts. 

Part 5:2 says that Baldazzar was the son of Nebuchadnezzar, not Nabunidu. In 6:1 it says that by the time Baldazar died, Darius the "terrible" had conquered Babylon, although history says that King Cyrus of the Persians did, and Darius was only able to take the city again in 521 BC. In 10:4 the prophet's vision of Babylon is described as "I found myself on the banks of the Tigris River," although Babylon is on the Euphrates River.

text:
The "Reptiloid" statues on the island of Nuku Hiva

Located at a place called Temechea-Tohua in the Marquesas Islands depicting strange creatures. They date from the beginning of the 2nd millennium. They are different: there are large, big-mouthed "reptiloids," and there are others: with small bodies and disproportionately large, elongated helmeted heads with huge eyes. 

One thing they have in common is a malicious expression. Who did our ancestors depict, representatives of another race or guests from other worlds? Maybe these were their spacesuits and they flew safely into space?

text:
The Green Children of Woolpit

A mysterious and allegedly real episode in the history of twelfth-century England. 

In the village of Woolpit, peasants found children who had a normal appearance, except for the green color of their skin.

There is a version that the children were prisoners who had escaped from the copper mines, and it was their long contact with copper that explained their greenish skin color.

text:
This perfectly round lake is located in the Ryazan region (enter N54Â° 37â€²40.11â€³ E41Â° 5â€²57.84â€³ on google maps). Its main feature, in addition to its shape, is the crystal clear water and the absence of any algae. 

Officially, the lake is of meteorite origin and clearly older than 500 years. Here's just after the fall of a meteorite in 99.9% of cases the crater remains drop-shaped or oval, and the lake is not on the old maps, until 1865, and then it magically appears. 

And most importantly. In the samples of the lake soil the radionuclide Cesium-137 was found, which is formed (drum roll)... only in the nuclear decay of uranium or plutonium. The version that it was "on board" a meteorite falls away, because the half-life of Cesium-137 is only 30 years (half-life is in 30 years it is 2 times less, in another 30 years it is 2 times less from half, etc.). And meteorites wander around in space longer.

So about 150-200 years ago people already had nuclear technology. But how so?

text:
What they read to children at bedtime is nonsense. Real Russian fairy tales are different: smarter, more interesting, and scarier. 

Baba Yaga is a hunched over old woman with a blue hooked nose, uncombed hair, and a dead leg. She is dressed in a shirt without a girdle, and her eyes burn red. Yaga's hands are dry, bones come out of her body in some places. She lives alone in a dense forest in a hut on chicken legs.

"Dremuchy Wood" in Russian legends means death. Yaga's hut is on a crossroads, but the entrance from the forest, i.e. from the world of death. In the past Kur'ya Noga was called a fork in the road, a bad and dangerous place where evil spirits gathered. Chicken legs" were also used to stand poles smoked by smoke and to put the "house" with the ashes of the deceased on them, without windows and doors. 

Why is "Baba Yaga the bony leg"? 
Why did "her nose grow into the ceiling"? 
Why is the hut "without windows, without doors"?

text:
Elongated Skulls

Many enthusiasts enthusiastically call elongated skulls evidence of forbidden archaeology. And some of them even believe that they are proof that the real history of mankind is in fact hidden from the people. But who, and more importantly, why is hiding the truth from us? Why are bizarre and unusual skull deformities ignored by scientists? And why do they persistently refuse to search for the truth?

Among the most interesting examples of elongated skulls are the so-called skulls of the Paracas culture. They were discovered in the province of Pisco, Peru, almost a century ago. Once upon a time, the Inca Empire flourished in these places. These skulls are thought to be about 3,000 years old. And DNA tests have allegedly shown that the elongated skulls of the Paracas culture belong to a completely unknown to science human species.

text:
Pakistani Sphinx.

An object that has already been dubbed the "Second Sphinx" was found in Pakistan. Immediately there were those who believe that this object, is a natural formation.

According to one version, its head is a portrait of the ancient Egyptian pharaoh who reigned 4500 years ago. Sphinx means Egyptian. Somehow it is hard to believe that the pharaoh decided to reassign himself as someone else's pyramid keeper.

To consider the Pakistani Sphinx a natural formation, a simple coincidence of forms would be possible, if its head had no obvious traces of machining. And the rock under its base is characterized by flat symmetric columns and stepped treatment of niches. A coincidence? Two objects next to the traces of processing rules out any possibility that this is a natural formation.

It remains to convince the scientific community, they have enough of the problematic Sphinx in Egypt.

It was later used as the basis for maps of Muscovy in Europe. A couple of Tartarys and the Horde are on the map. The funny thing is that the map of Russian tsarevich with the signature about Tartaria completely contradicts the opinion of modern scientists about its existence. 

The tsar simply did not know that no Tartary existed on his territory. And his neighbors do not exist, and he does not trade with Tartars. Our historians will not lie

text:
In Spain, 18 km from Alicante, there is a dam called Tibi. 

The dam was built incredibly competently for its year of construction - 1580. Fourteen years later, the dam was completed. Not only is it arched-gravity type (according to modern classification) - it is also located on the river in the place where the river crosses a high rocky ridge. The dam rests against the rocky shores with its edges - and the water pressure is pushing it apart.

Can you imagine the complexity of calculations? Design institutes work on such constructions. And all modern dams and dikes are made of reinforced concrete. And here - stone blocks, the reliability of the construction made of them should be even higher!

Can you imagine how many blocks had to be cut down, shifted and laid? And all this for 14 years.

text:
The mystery of the birth of the soul. What causes us to be born on Earth?

There is no "want" or "don't want" here. The soul perceives the necessity of incarnation as natural and necessary as a dream for us. it is a kind of instinct of cosmic scale. It strives for incarnation itself, as it is the only way to transform accumulated energies and get new experiences.

Not when the event has happened, but before the birth the choice has already been made and the events are predetermined. I would like to emphasize that parents give a child only a physical body and heredity at the level of physiology of the nation in which the soul is born.

At the moment when the time of birth (incarnation) comes, the soul sees its future life. Even if just for a moment, it sees all the connecting events and the whole burden of responsibility which it has to accept. And the more spiritually developed the soul is, the broader its access to the definition of the upcoming events in its life.

text:
There are many versions about the origin of the Moon. Some of them are so unbelievable that they seem like nonsense

Below is perhaps the craziest theory that our satellite is artificial. 

1. The satellite always faces the same side of the Earth. In addition, the reverse side is very different from the visible side by its roughness. If the moon is a natural body, this should not be the case.
2. The diameter of the Moon is 1/395 of the diameter of the Sun, and the distance between the Moon and the Earth is 1/395 of the distance between the Earth and the Sun. Nature again?
3. Almost all lunar craters are circular. This means that the asteroids hit the surface at right angles. 
4. The moon reflects light at the full moon with the entire surface of the disk. According to the laws of optics, the edges of the disk should be dim and barely visible. The angle of incidence equals the angle of reflection - this law of optics is violated by the Moon.

text:
Modern people are very dependent on electricity, in spite of its cost and the negative impact of its generation on the environment.

But what if electricity were available to everyone and its generation were much easier? The Swiss village of Linden is much luckier than most people, electricity is more accessible to them and generation is easier. For more than 40 years, they have been living off a generator created by Paul Bauman. It consists of discs that rotate using the forces of electrostatic interaction. The pioneering device has not gained widespread popularity, to the delight of companies that produce electricity by conservative methods.

Apparently, until the planet's resources are exhausted, we will learn about such inventions only accidentally and with great delay.

text:
Most of Australia is enclosed by a rabbit-proof fence, which closes the way to the interior of the continent. However, with the development of aerial photography and space imagery, it has become much easier to see what's going on inside the closed continent. 

Rex Gilroy in 1975 discovered a structure suspiciously resembling a pyramid on the outskirts of the town of Gimpy (Gimpy). Officials quickly oriented themselves and issued a version that it was a farm structure that had been built by a Swiss florist in the late 1880s. 

The mythical florist was fruitful - 3 similar pyramidal structures were found at a distance of 1'600 km from each other, next to which were found ancient artifacts.

Creatures "Swiss" are so uninteresting that access to them and research is prohibited. Something these bans reminded of Politics of China. Though probably the pyramids were built by the scientists themselves to distract attention from what can be really there. Why is this fence so high?

text:
Kyshtym Dwarf

In 1996, an elderly woman in the Chelyabinsk region found a living creature. Outwardly similar to a person, but 30 centimeters tall. The woman tried for about a month to get out. However, the creature still died. 

Later its remains were found in a mummified state. But even they had mysteriously disappeared.

text:
Three ingredients are needed to make gunpowder: saltpeter, sulfur and coal. There has always been coal in China. Until the 18th century, native sulphur was only available at the mouth of the volcano Etna, in Sicily. The nearest deposit of saltpeter was on the island of Ceylon. In the Mendeleev Table, only saltpeter and sulphur may be components of black powder, while all other explosives are explosive, and any cannon would be blown to pieces if used. 

How could China invent gunpowder with only 1 of 3 components?

text:
What can a connoisseur of Hebrew learn from reading the Torah in its original form? Mauro Bijino answers:

"...The Old Testament (OT) does not speak of God.

The Bible became a sacred text for monotheistic religions because of the manipulation of key terms. The Masoretes (Jewish scribes who in the 6th-9th centuries "established" the meaning of the contents of the ancient texts) and theologians did this.

Translating literally, it turns out that the NT tells of a treaty between Yahweh the warrior of the Elohim group and Jacob's family and nothing else. The rest is a reworking by the theologians."

An ordinary people's history book that has been greatly embellished and diluted with fantastic details.

text:
In the 17th century Martin Martinius published a book in Latin titled "Bellum Tartaricum or the Conquest of the Great and Most Famous Chinese Empire by the Tartars...".

The story of the conquest of China begins, "The most ancient nation of Tartars in Asia, which was the progenitor of many nations..." - And true, the peoples of Tartary at that time were noted from the coast of the Bering Sea to the very borders of Muscovy, and with such a prevalence, it is not surprising that this nation was related to many peoples living here. Only one historical mishap - officially, such a people never existed, and the nearest people suitable for the habitat (the Scythians), according to the same academic history, died out back in the 4th century BC.

text:
In "Bellum Tartaricum...", translated into English in 1654, there is a portrait of the Emperor of the Eastern Tartars who conquered the Chinese Empire.

The appearance of the ruler brings to my mind our boyars, who wore fur-lined caftans and the hat of Monomakh as a symbol of royal power. However, Asian rulers were not entitled to either.

text:
The stele of the pharaoh Cheops is rarely exhibited in museums, but often lies in the storerooms. The whole reason is in the text on the stele - the Sphinx stood before Cheops, the Great Pyramids too, Cheops himself built only the temple of Isis, which in size and technology is strongly inferior to both the pyramids and the Sphinx. Such is the degradation of technology, of which the hieroglyphs are carved in stone.

Official historians do not recognize this translation of the inscriptions, but could not provide their own sensible version. As soon as independent Egyptologists and translators offer to help the officials with the translation, the stele disappears from the expositions at once.

text:
Do rocks grow after it rains? Trovantes, living stones as evidence of silicon life.

Trovantes, this is the name given to the living stones by the locals. After it rains, they begin to grow in size. Over time, they develop sprouts and after gaining mass, they detach from the mother rock and begin to live on their own. Their shape is round and they often do not differ much from ordinary stones. They have a sandstone structure and a hard core, around which there are rings similar to those we see in trees. 

A stone weighing only a few grams can grow to a ton. Scientists have no way to explain this phenomenon, although it has existed for quite some time. Despite the fact that there are many theories that life can be based not only on carbon, but also on silicon, science continues to ignore Trovantes.

text:
In the Boston Journal of Chemistry, 1890, there are photographs of human bones larger than usual: "Mr. Lapouge's remarkable 'find' was the three pieces of bone shown in the engraving, which must have belonged to some prehistoric giant of extraordinary size. 

On the left is part of the thigh bone, and on the right is part of the tibia or tibia. In the middle is the humerus, or upper arm bone, from the same ancient cemetery, but of normal size. 

Judging the height of this Neolithic giant by the ratio of skeletal parts, he must have been about 3.5m tall. " The bones of the giant were examined at the University of Montpellier, where it was recognized that they belonged to "a member of a very high race.

text:
Ivan Zabelin published "The History of the City of Moscow" in 1905 on behalf of the Municipal Duma. It contains engravings of different masters with views of the capital city and one of them contains interesting sketches.

A copy of the watercolor drawing by Guarenghi (original 18th century) shows underground ruins on the left. There are ruined arched vaults that have had time to overgrow bushes and a large stone or section of engraved wall. The costumes of the armed couple at the stone are also intriguing. While those around them are dressed in camisoles and hats, these fellows are dressed in some sort of toga, helmets, and holding a shield. What kind of antique animators are these walking by the ruins?

text:
Fernand Magellan was the first person in history to circumnavigate the globe, and from there he brought back the story of the giant he encountered and even captured him on a map. The giant was at least 4 meters tall, and a grown man could walk between his legs. 

That's why the Spaniards called the natives "giants" (Patagayo in Spanish), respectively, and the natives were called Patah-goons, and the land itself has been called Patagonia ever since.

text:
This object was discovered in early 2018 and people have had time to take screenshots and write articles about it. We see a hill with 4 four elevations, following each other in a row. Each successive rad is smaller in length than the previous one. Surely there are more rows under the snow, but this is a hypothesis without foundation.

Perhaps the find is part of a structure, the main part of which goes far under the ice. The visible part of the object, which resembles walls, has a through hole through all the rows. This may indicate the reinforcement of something that can pass through such a through passage. However, the limited information does not allow us to make any assertions.

text:
A mysterious artifact was discovered in northwest China in the 1990s, after which history can be rewritten. 

It is a small stone of 6 x 8 cm, though the rock cannot be determined, but it is normal for meteorites. But in addition to the unknown composition of the stone was distinguished by its interior, which is filled with a metal rod, which requires a high level of technology to create it.

Scientists do not hide the results of the dating, which is about 300 million years old. A similar artifact was found in Russia, also a stone with metal stuffing and impossible dating. 

It would seem that we take out the history books and begin to rewrite, or throw out the methods of dating, which give unrealistic results, but no - historians have decided to do more cunning, artifacts disappear after the study, and the methods of analysis remain unchanged.

text:
Amateur historian Matt Sibson has made the bold assumption that there are hidden rooms beneath the Egyptian Sphinx. He believes that directly beneath the sculpture are several secret rooms that are connected to the pyramids.

Sibson stated that the Sphinx may be connected to the pyramids by an extensive network of rooms and tunnels. He suggested that the lost door might be a way to get inside the pyramids. He refers to documents that were written from an 1837 expedition by Egyptologist Howard Weiss. He writes in his book that he became aware that French engineers were conducting extensive excavations in front of the Sphinx. They managed to get to the secret door, but then the excavation was stopped.

text:
On the border between Guinea and Mali, a giant statue 150 meters high is carved into a granite mountain.

The figure, called the Lady of Mali, is 1.5 km above the ground, or rather, above an abyss.

Geological studies have established its age at 20,000 years. What Paleolithic civilization had the technology to create statues of such gigantic size?

text:
Byliny, fairy tales, legends and myths were not born out of nothing...

Adherents of the theories about a race of giants, which lived on our planet millions of years ago, have received new evidence - a giant footprint was found on the territory of southern Africa. It was found in Swaziland. The footprint, like a human, reaches 120 centimeters in length. According to scientists, it could well have been left by a prehistoric giant. And Darwin's theory of evolution can now be thrown out of school textbooks, because it cannot explain it.

text:
The Nubian Archaeological Museum holds one very strange artifact dating from between 4000 and 3500 BC. The ostrich egg supposedly depicts three pyramids. 

Could they be Egyptian pyramids? It does not look like that, they were built 2000 years later than the artifact, and the form is not similar.
 
The nearest similar pyramids are those of Meroe, built between 720 and 300 B.C. in what is now Sudan. But the shape and the angle of inclination perfectly coincides with the drawing on the artifact. 

Good versions, but too big a discrepancy in dates. According to the official history of course. If we assume that historians were slightly (by a couple of millennia) wrong, then both the artifact and the Meroe pyramids perfectly fit into one historical branch.

text:
A stone head from Guatemala.

Half a century ago, deep in the jungles of Guatemala, searchers found a giant monument - a stone head of a man of enormous size. The searchers were very surprised by their find: the face had the distinct features of a white man, and was drastically different from any of the pre-Hispanic civilizations of South America. The find quickly attracted attention, but it was also quickly forgotten, and information about the statue fell off the pages of history.

Researchers believe that the statue's facial features depicted a representative of an ancient civilization that was much more advanced than the natives before the arrival of the Spaniards. Nevertheless, the giant stone statue existed, and there is no reason to believe that the photograph is a fake. So where did it come from? Who created it? And why?

text:
Table Mountain.

Mount Roraima is the most famous and also the highest Venezuelan tepui (table mountain), reaching a height of 2810 meters. It is located at the junction of Brazil (state of Roraima).

Notice the mountain that it is not only flattened on the sides, but also on top is a flat area, as if it was cut by a huge saw. What do you think, natural or man-made?

text:
Too smart ancient people

It is no secret that the knowledge of the same structure of the planets, astronomy, distances of planets and stars, all this was known to many civilizations of the past.

And this is not just words, but a fact confirmed by many findings, from star charts, to chronicles describing the structure of the solar system and the stars beyond.

Obviously, without equipment and technology, it is impossible to study space in principle. And many of the knowledge, our civilization has received quite recently, but judging by all appearances, some ancient civilizations knew thousands of years ago no less. But how - this is another question.

text:
At the pyramid of Amenemhat 2, pieces of a quartzite sarcophagus, abandoned by archaeologists, are lying on the sand. A perfect creation and magnificent workmanship. 

Analysis of the samples of this sarcophagus under an electron microscope would baffle even Egyptologists and historians of repute: the pieces do not show signs of copper and tin, ie neither copper nor bronze tools were used in its manufacture (and the Egyptians did not have others). As for the tools, the quartz crystals were not knocked out of the machined surface at all, but chipped, indicating mechanical with a high velocity of the tool. These are signs of high technology, which the Egyptians did not have. Nor did people in general for many centuries. According to official history, of course.

text:
STONE PLATE FROM NEPAL

The Loladoff Plate is a stone dish that is more than 12,000 years old. This artifact was found in Nepal. The images and the clear lines carved on the surface of this flat stone, many researchers suggested the idea of its extraterrestrial origin. Could not the ancient people so skillfully work the stone? In addition, the "plate" depicts a creature very reminiscent of an alien in his well-known image.

text:
Ancient machines?

This is a censer from Costa Rica and a photo of a modern rotary excavator. The official date is the 6th-11th century.

Judging by the fact that this mechanism is depicted in the form of some beast, whoever made the statue saw or heard how it was used, but did not "shoot" at all what happens and how it works. Show a native our excavators now and he would do the same. But, where did they come from in those centuries?

text:
Temehea-Tohua, French Polynesia.

Statues of strange creatures have been found on the island of Nuku-Hiva, part of the Marquesas Archipelago, at Temehea-Tohua. Disproportionate torsos, elongated heads with large mouths and eyes. 

Archaeologists date the creation of the mysterious statues to about X-XI centuries. Why did the natives make them? 

According to the official version, they are monuments to priests in ritual masks. But it is strange that the masks themselves were not found on the island. Hence the assumption that Nuku-Hiva was once visited by aliens, and the locals imprinted their appearance in stone.

text:
Classical Egyptology claims that the sphinx was built in the time of Pharaoh Cheops or his son - about 2.5 thousand years B.C. - on the sole basis that its "artistic features" can be attributed to that era. 

A century and a half ago, a so-called "Inventory Stella" was found at Giza, which indicated that Cheops had only commanded that the damaged statue be repaired. Repair it, not erect it! 

And in the early 1990s, American geologist Robert Schoch proved that the furrows on the body of the sphinx and on the trench wall around it are traces of erosion not wind erosion, but rain erosion: vertical bands instead of horizontal ones. But there had been no serious rainfall in Egypt for at least 8,000 years. 

Immediately after the publication of Schoch, the Egyptian authorities began the restoration of the sphinx. Now the lower two-thirds of the monument are closed with new masonry, and the top of the sculpture is scrubbed - almost no traces of erosion remain.

text_entities.text:
Classical Egyptology claims that the sphinx was built in the time of Pharaoh Cheops or his son - about 2.5 thousand years B.C. - on the sole basis that its "artistic features" can be attributed to that era. 

A century and a half ago, a so-called "Inventory Stella" was found at Giza, which indicated that Cheops had only commanded that the damaged statue be repaired. Repair it, not erect it! 

And in the early 1990s, American geologist Robert Schoch proved that the furrows on the body of the sphinx and on the trench wall around it are traces of erosion not wind erosion, but rain erosion: vertical bands instead of horizontal ones. But there had been no serious rainfall in Egypt for at least 8,000 years. 

Immediately after the publication of Schoch, the Egyptian authorities began the restoration of the sphinx. Now the lower two-thirds of the monument are closed with new masonry, and the top of the sculpture is scrubbed - almost no traces of erosion remain.
Forbidden Science

text:
The Five Eyes Intelligence Alliance, aka the Five Eyes Club, emerged during the Cold War era when several countries signed an intelligence sharing agreement (UKUSA). Initially, the U.S. and Britain agreed to exchange data, so they tried to combat the intelligence of the USSR.
In the late 50s, Canada, Australia and New Zealand joined the treaty. These five English-speaking countries formed the Five Eyes Club, as it is known today. Over time, the data-sharing treaty linking these five countries became more and more advanced, and now it also includes surveillance of online activities.

text:
Sylendstskull.

The story involves the discovery of a skull that does not resemble a human skull or the skull of any other primate. 

It happened in 2007, but the find was kept strictly secret until 2010. Researchers concluded that it most likely belonged to an unknown mammal species with an extremely advanced intelligence. Radiocarbon dating showed that its owner lived between 1200 and 1280 AD. 

The sylendst skull is almost one and a half times the size of a human, and the most prominent part of it is the huge eye sockets. Scientists speculate that this creature could see well in the dark. From the structure of the skull, scientists have determined that the creature walked on its hind legs, swam very well and was three meters tall. The structure of the teeth indicates that the owner of the skull was a predator. 

Unfortunately, no more information about its owner Silendstskiy skull and gave no other information. Who did such an unusual skull belong to?

text:
Mysterious Map

This map was purchased by Chinese collector Liu Gang in 2001 at an antique store in Shanghai for $500. It is dated 1763 but bears the inscription: "This map was drawn by Mo Yi Tong, a Qing dynasty subject, during the reign of Emperor Gong Li in 1763 from an original map of 1418. The Chinese map, however, already shows both Americas. Both the west and east coasts are shown. And this is 74 years before Columbus arrived there.

London, New York, Florence, Geneva, Washington and Dubai. This is not one arch and a photoshopped background - these are real objects from different cities and countries, with different patterns and histories. Let's be honest - small protruding side elements or patterns located at human height have a much better chance of breaking off than the top center element supported by the structure on three sides. 

Does no one wonder how it came to be that all the arches have a broken or removed central element? Judging by the similarity of the destruction, the element was destroyed on purpose.

text:
In 1985 there was a sensation. On the Japanese island of Yogaguni similar pyramids were discovered. The first studies revealed that the stone objects occupy an extensive area almost all around the southern shore of the island.

The central structure is a stone massif, called a monument, which is a rather complicated structure, the base of which is a high platform 200 meters long, 150 meters wide, and 25 meters high. There are flat terraces on it, which go down in massive steps. The architecture of this structure resembles the pyramids of the ancient Incas and is 5000 years old. 

Do you think this is an ancient submerged city where people once lived or a natural mountain formation? So far, no one can make a definite conclusion, and the mystery of the underwater pyramids will continue to excite the minds and imagination of researchers for a long time to come.

text:
In July 1944, Waldemar Yulsrud made a high-profile discovery in the Mexican Acambaro. He discovered statuettes depicting dinosaurs, animals unknown to us, reptiles, unknown deities and objects of everyday life (smoking pipes, musical instruments). 

What struck him most about the dinosaurs was how these people could depict animals they supposedly could not see. Once again, traditional archaeology makes a mistake and chooses, despite the obvious facts, to remain adamant. The statuettes date back to 2500 B.C.

text:
The Mystery of Mount Baigongshan

A group of American scientists in China stumbled upon an interesting discovery. The scientists found several pipes in the cave, which are embedded in the rock and go in different directions - to the top of the mountain and somewhere deep into the ground. The tubes are different in diameter, from 2 to 40 cm. They look very rusty and give the impression of some remains of an ancient system. A total of 12 of them were found on the surface.

According to experts, the tubes are woven into a complex system and have an unusual geometry, indicating that the creators knew a lot about engineering and had special technology. According to scientists about 8% of the pipe composition could not be identified, the rest is composed of iron oxide and other impurities, the alloy also contains a lot of oxidized silicon and calcium, which indicates a solid age of over 5 thousand years.

text:
What the ruins are silent about. What happened in 1700?

The French painter Hubert Robert (1733-1808) traveled extensively through Europe and left us very interesting paintings from which we can learn something about our past. Hubert is said to have had a good imagination and many of his paintings are based on his many fantasies of majestic ruins, but is this really the case? 

The paintings clearly show that the people depicted live among the ruins of former civilizations and are utterly unable to at least make them look decent, let alone restore them in any way. Either the people were very lazy, or they could not work on such a scale and with technology unknown to them.

text:
Next to the Qutb Minar Tower in Delhi is an iron column 7.5 meters high. The diameter of its base is 41.6 cm, at the top it is slightly narrowed - the upper diameter is about 30 cm. This column weighs 6.8 tons. Who, when and where (it was not made in Delhi) it created - to this day remains a mystery.

But the most interesting thing is the composition of the column. It is 99.72% iron and only 0.28% - are impurities. There is almost no corrosion on the black-blue surface of the megalite (only barely visible spots). The strange thing is that the production of pure iron is very difficult and is not done on a large scale. And iron of such purity, even with modern equipment, is simply not realistic.

text:
Victor Stepanovich Grebennikov was a naturalist, professional entomologist, artist, in a word, an intellectual with a wide range of interests and occupations.

In 1988, he stated that he had discovered the presence of antigravity effects determined by the characteristic structure of the chitinous shell of some insects.

Based on this finding, he wanted to reproduce the structure and designed several prototypes that, because of their shape alone, generated such a large force that they could rise from the ground and overcome gravity on their own. His training and the conclusions he came to allowed him to build a small platform that he said could get off the ground and make several flights at an incredible maximum speed of 25 km/min. He claimed to have used this device for rapid transportation in 1991-1992.

text:
In 2016, there were publications in the media about 3.5-meter giants with two heads from Patagonia. Immediately they began to say that "probably" in the old days there were human giants living on Earth. This assumption is made by scientists examining brought from Patagonia humanoid skeleton.

Its height is 3.5 meters, about twice that of modern humans.

According to one version, it was a member of a special race of giants that could theoretically live on all continents. At least, in ancient epics there are constant references to giants who were endowed with demonic powers, tremendous strength and power over ordinary people.

text:
The story of the Chinese long-lived man Li Qingyun is not scientifically confirmed. According to scattered information, this man lived 256 years and died in 1933. The long-lived man himself claimed that he was born in 1736. The old man named Qijiangxian settlement as his birthplace. Neighbors said that the elder was married 23 times and had more than 200 children.

Li Qingyun's story has been researched by many scholars and journalists. In 1930, an issue of the New York Times published an article in which Professor Wu Chung-Jie of Chengdu University revealed the government records of the Chinese Empire from 1827.

Whether the elder really lived more than 2.5 centuries and what was the secret of his longevity remains a mystery.
