text:
The Classified Census: How Millions of Soviet Citizens Disappeared

In 1937, a census was conducted in the Soviet Union. After it was completed, it was classified and those responsible for it were arrested.

It was supposed that more than 165 million people lived in the USSR at that time. In fact it turned out that the population was not more than 162 million people. 

Where several million Soviet citizens disappeared to remains a mystery

text:
30 km from Magadan, on one of the mountains is a large megalithic wall. It is not perfectly built, but it is made of blocks weighing dozens of tons. If it seems that the blocks are rough enough, then after a closer look one can see stones with drilled holes, concave megaliths, stones with cut (polished) parts, traces of sawing of masonry.

When the researchers began to examine the site from satellite maps, it turned out that all the megaliths are on a perfectly flat line. The central part of the structure is very reminiscent of a spear, and its tip points to the Bering Strait. In the past, it is believed that there was an isthmus there, where it was possible to cross from Eurasia to America. That is, it turns out that the main purpose of these megaliths is to show the way. But the fact is that from the surface it is impossible to see. They discovered the "spear" only with the help of satellite maps, as if this pointer was put for flying vehicles.

text:
An ordinary children's tale becomes much scarier if one understands the original meaning of the words.

Baba Yaga is a hunched over old woman with a blue hooked nose, uncombed hair, and a dead leg. She is dressed in a shirt without a girdle, her eyes burn red. Yaga's hands are dry, bones come out of her body in some places. She lives alone in a dense forest in a hut on chicken legs.

"Dremuchy Wood" in Russian legends means death. Yaga's hut is on a crossroads, but the entrance from the forest, i.e. from the world of death. In the past Kur'ya Noga was called a fork in the road, a bad and dangerous place where evil spirits gathered. Chicken legs" were also used to stand poles smoked by smoke and to put the "house" with the ashes of the deceased on them, without windows and doors. 

Why is "Baba Yaga the bony leg"? 
Why did "her nose grow into the ceiling"? 
Why is the hut "without windows, without doors"?

In this case, the official version says that the work on the statues took decades with a hammer and chisel. But the human eye is not perfect and it is simply physically impossible to achieve such an exact result with a hand tool.

text:
Albert Fernick's 1888 photo of the Eiffel Tower is photographed in an unfamiliar way. It's not the angle, but the stone base of the tower. 

Of course, heavy structures and buildings need foundations or piles to keep them from sagging. What is now hidden from the eyes of tourists and miraculously survived in the picture is confusing - stone blocks and metal supports stand on the old brick walls. The masonry and buried arches seem suspiciously familiar from previous posts about the flood and clay drifts.

"On the ruins of the old world we will build a new world."

"Enemy of the State" is a predictive film.

The main character tries to convince those around him that their every move is being tracked by the secret services. In 1998 such a plot seemed unrealistic. 

But 15 years later it became known that the U.S. is really conducting mass surveillance. The film predicted events when Edward Snowden was declared an enemy of the state.

text:
Layers of the Earth.

The Edda, Vishnu, Mahabharata, and Vedas of Perun write that the Earth used to have three satellites, Lela, Phatta, and the Moon. The Phatta satellite fell into the ocean about 13,000 years ago, and the wave of its fall sunk Atlantis.

What, it would seem, do photos of the layers of the earth have to do with it? American and European scientists have recently concluded that about 12,800 years ago, a huge (several kilometers in diameter) asteroid fell into the Atlantic Ocean. This date was deduced by radiocarbon analysis of "black mats" - this is a black layer of earth in the photo. Nano-diamonds and evidence of a catastrophic explosion at a temperature of over 2000 g and an enormous pressure were found in it.

In fact, all at once the legends of the "moons", the catastrophe and the Deluge were confirmed. It is a small matter, the only thing left is to find Atlantis.

text:

The date of construction is not clear. It is known that the fort was already there during the Spanish siege of the town of Elvas in 1658.

text:
Our entire history is based on five 11th century chronicles. Moreover, one of them consists of only four surviving planks ("Novgorod codex" of 1015).

The other 4 :
- Ostromirov Gospel (1056).
- Svyatoslav's Izbornik (1073)
- Izbornik of Svyatoslav (1076)
- Archangel's Gospel (1092).

Earlier 11 century documentary information is absent.

Scholars are left to use only works of 12-13-14 centuries and various "lists" (copies).
At the same time, there are over 300,000 old Latin manuscripts. Although they were burned and destroyed.
And in schools we study for some reason the text of "The Tale of Bygone Years", rewritten an unknown number of times and unknown by whom.

text:
This is the Cup of Lycurgus, which was made in Rome, and probably in Alexandria itself about 1600 years ago.

And it is capable of changing color.
If the artifact is illuminated by daylight from the front, it has a greenish tint, if illuminated from behind, it turns red.

The archaeologists' dating is based solely on the fact that the first people to excel in glass were the Romans. There is no further evidence that it was created in the 4th century AD.
In the composition of 1 million particles of glass by unknown creators were added 330 nano-particles of silver and only 40 gold. At the same time, the size of these particles was only 50 nanometers. Thanks to this there is a change in color at different angles of illumination.

An open question: how could the Romans at the dawn of our era get nano-particles of the right size?

text:
The clay disk of Phaistos was excavated on Crete in 1908. Its symbols do not relate to any Cretean script, and the clay it is made of is not found on the island.

In 2001 there was information about a find of the Vladikavkaz disk, but the scientific world did not recognize the find, and the author was accused of forgery. 

And in 2020 in the Ryazan area has found a new clay disc, similar to that of Phaistos. The author showed his find to the local museum, where he was reassured that any controversial object found not by archaeologists is not recognized by academic science. He must first call specialists, they will begin an excavation and draw up the papers according to all their rules. 

The Ryazan disk does not look like a fake, just put in the ground. But where is Crete and where is the Ryazan region. An inconvenient find for historians, which is better to declare a fake, and not to study.

text:
In the 1990s, scientists in Indonesia discovered two strange stones with engraved human figures and images of the solar system in detail

Archaeologists have tried to determine the age of the find, but it turned out that the drawings are several hundred thousand years old. A similar drawing was sent on the shuttle Pioneer 10 in 1972 (a picture of intelligent life on the planet, the number of planets in our solar system and the Sun). But I highly doubt that our ancestors were going to send data into space on the ancient shuttle.

text:
The Byzantine ambassador Priyscus of Panium went to the Hun King Attila in 449. The diplomat was expecting leather tents and unwashed horsemen, but the city, which stood across three rivers northeast of the Danube, was built of wood. A royal palace with carved mansions stood on a mountain. Guests were greeted with bread and salt, honey, and kvass.

In the cathedral of Reims there is a bas-relief depicting the death of Bishop Nicasius at the hands of the cruel Huns. The Huns are depicted in chainmail and with weapons, it is impossible to confuse them with saints and mourners. The beards are either missing or neatly trimmed. Hairstyles. There is no eye slanting, although the evil murderers could have been depicted as squint-eyed freaks. 

Were Atilla and his army really Asiatic? Or were the Huns, because of the long wars, completely, poor, weakened?

text:
Who left 2-meter-deep wheel tracks in Turkey 14 million years ago? 

The "ancient road" in the Phrygian Valley is known for 2m deep wheel tracks. 

The wheels are spinning, the rock and soil parts are wiped out, forming deep ruts. And now the most interesting thing - the area on the road to Phrygia has been dated to the Lower Paleocene period, and the rock structure was formed 12-14mln years ago. 

It seems strange that in spite of the active life of people in this region, these layers lay millions of years ago and have not aged or grown a cultural layer. How old are these traces?

text:
In 1651 the Dutch painter Abraham van Westerfeld visited Kiev and made a number of amazing drawings. The ruins of the city and beggars, cripples begging for alms.

The Polish diplomat who visited Kiev in 1596 has signed a note to the drawings: "The monuments of former greatness remain: the gates of ancient structure, high that two carts, put one on the other, don't reach their tops. In the city itself there are many destroyed churches. One of them remains - St. Sophia, but even that, in such a miserable form, that worship does not take place in it.

It turns out that Kiev was once a grandiose city, but some mysterious events destroyed it, and its mysteries remained in the past.

text:
The Goba meteorite, the largest meteorite ever found, is in Namibia

It is believed that the meteorite came to Earth about 80'000 years ago, but was found relatively recently, in 1920, completely by accident. The find is interesting because there is no crater around the meteorite, and it is literally at the surface of the earth. Simply put: a block of iron, weighing 66 tons, fell from the sky at a tremendous speed, leaving no trace of the fall.

text:
On the falsification of history by historians themselves

John Magnus wrote an impressive work on the history of the Swedish kingdom and its rulers in the 16th century. But after 5 centuries, thousands of archaeological excavations and foreign chronicles, it turns out that all events up to 1000 in the work of Magnus were frankly invented. The chronicler made up 11 kings - 5 Erik before Erik the Victorious and 6 Charles before Charles Sverkerson.

A historian and engaged in historical forgery, who would have thought.

text:
The 1556 Atlas of the World and its interesting page with a map of the South Pole. Spoiler - no ice, no snow, a normal continent with detailed outlines, and yet practically connecting to Australia and South America. 

How's that for past geography? It turns out that in a certain period of time, when the Bering Strait and Drake Passage did not exist, mankind could literally walk from continent to continent. But if maps (and cartographers and travelers at the same time) are to be believed, this was not tens of thousands of years ago, but only in the 16th century.

text:
Catacomb Plan and Depth, Rome

To build an underground city just to bury people makes no sense and is super expensive. Between 7 and 8 million people were buried in the Roman catacombs alone. 

Most likely, they were intended to protect the masses of people from a global phenomenon, as modern bomb shelters. But something went wrong and many in the catacombs died. Hence the millions at Paris or Rome. Since not all died at once, they first tried to immure the carcasses in niches, since otherwise the bodies could not be disposed of (Rome), but in Paris, according to experts, the bones were boiled (allegedly this was a form of cleaning the bones of the flesh. But why??). Or maybe - was it cannibalism in Paris in the catacombs to survive? 
Assuming that a world nuclear war would happen, part of the population would escape in the current catacombs called the subway, which makes sense.

text:
Did you always think Stonehenge was several thousand years old?

You thought it was built by Druids and aliens, because scientists are very vocal about it. Dozens of documentaries have been made about it. But on television they would not say that it was reconstructed in 1954-1958, that is completely redone, moved from another place and rebuilt again from the metal blocks with plaster (that is a fake).

text:
Giant Women in the 19th Century

This photo, "Giant Women on the Road to Raarsu," was taken in 1897 by Dr. Hughets. 

There are at least three tall women in the picture. The central one is 22 years old and is 230 cm tall. The lady on the right is over six feet tall.

Judging by the unique exhibit from the National Museum of Natural History of France, not only traces of Patagonian giants are missing from history.

text:
Sudden disappearance of the Sumerian civilization

According to archaeologists, the Sumerian civilization is as mysterious as the Mayan civilization. They appeared more than 7,000 years ago and invented text before the Egyptian civilization.

Although the Sumerian civilization had early origins, the civilization mysteriously disappeared, and at present people can only speculate about their environment of survival and development. It is said that the Sumerian civilization may have returned to its parent star. 

There is also the opinion that some natural causes may have led to the disappearance of the Sumerian civilization, not necessarily that they actually came from an extraterrestrial planet.

text:
The South Pole was discovered by R. Amundsen's expedition in 1911?

It is believed that before him "the way to one of the most inaccessible places on Earth" no one could overcome.

We would argue. Look at old maps that show South America and Antarctica as continents connected by an isthmus. It was free to walk across it.

The present-day Drake Passage, the characteristic mark on the seafloor, and the strange arrangement of the islands suggest that South America and Antarctica may have been one land. 

The ancient peoples had no problem moving around. They walked farther and farther away.

text:
Kondana - a complex of 16 caves and temples

The complex is located 30 kilometers from the nearest settlement. Immediately the question is, why would people need a temple so far away from their home? 
Look at the pictures. Incredibly large-scale, detailed, and beautiful elements were carved out of the rock - you can see the work of a primitive tool at once.

text:
The mysteries of the lighting of the mines. Egypt.

What did ancient Egyptian builders use for lighting when digging mines? It may have been numerous torches or candles, but they would have left soot, which does not occur. Also a burning fire in a confined space quickly absorbs oxygen.

Some bas-reliefs in the pyramids point to a more advanced lighting system that would seem impossible for representatives of the ancient Egyptians. It shows the lamps of lighting, in two projections, also shows the connection of these lamps, from the lower electrode goes a wire into the stone, from which an insulator is arranged, and the electricity in the lamp is shown in the form of a wriggling snake. It is quite symbolic to depict electricity as a wriggling snake, which can bite and kill. In fact, it is a schematic device for extracting and using electrostatic electricity.

text:
9,500 year old obsidian bracelet created by machining

A fragment of an ancient artifact was discovered in 1990, during excavations in Turkey. Even then, a part of the alleged bracelet interested many people because it was very well processed obsidian.

As a result of some research, it was found that the fragment of the bracelet is made of obsidian (Mohs hardness - 5-5,5), but the processing and level of polishing is striking, even for our time.

Yes, it is still not granite, but the age is officially set at 9500 years. But according to the official history, then people had almost nothing, not to mention any machining.

text:
There is an opinion that on the territory of the modern Sahara Desert there once existed a highly developed civilization of the Garamantes. 

Herodotus also mentioned this tribe. The great kingdom of the Haramans stretched from the Atlas Mountains to the borders of Egypt.

The high development of the Haramante culture is evidenced by the many kilometers of tunnels under the desert, from Sebha in Libya to the oasis of Ghat near the Algerian border. These tunnels represent a huge underground water system. Scientists estimate that the total length of the system is about 1600 km. These tunnels were cut into the rock more than five millennia ago, which coincides approximately with the date of the unified state of Egypt.

text:
Ankh and the Tesla coil image are similar 

Ankh is a famous Egyptian sign.  On the left is a picture of a Tesla coil device with a flat inductor and an overhead inductor arrangement.

The Egyptians did not draw abstract symbols of life or power to the gods, but represented real technical devices to the public.

text:
Mosaic from the ancient Roman city of Palestrina. 100 BC. 

Depicts a recognizable dinosaur (similar to iguanodon). The inscription is easily readable in Russian "crocodilopardalik". Pardus or pardalik in Ancient Rus was called a leopard. Two proofs in one: the proximity of "extinct" reptiles to humans and the Russian writing before the Cyrillic alphabet.

In the 1960s, Helge and Anne Ingstad conducted archaeological excavations in North America. The site they surveyed turned out to be the first European settlement settled by the Vikings in the 11th century. 500 years before Columbus.

L'Anse-aux-MÃ©douze is even recognized by the officers, indeed the Norwegians settled here in the pre-Columbian era, but... no one is in a hurry to revise established geographical hypotheses. Funny, they themselves acknowledged an entire settlement and deny any new "pre-Columbian" artifacts themselves. A bit hypocritical, no? And the question of how the Vikings got to North America remains open.

text:
The Museum at Teply Stan in Moscow displays the skeletons of lizards found in the 20th century. This is about the size of the beast that St. George kills on the coat of arms of Moscow. Most of the finds were dug up on the Northern Dvina River, but they were simply buried back because "it was not possible to store such a huge collection of bones. 

Impressed by the size of the lizards, scientists immediately attributed them to the Paleozoic, although mentions of them survived in texts until the 17th century. Indeed, who wants to explain how a reptile the size of a calf managed to survive in the northern latitudes and delight the peasants by crawling out of the river to them?

text:
Fragment of the map of 1578.

On all maps earlier than 1700, the Caspian Sea has a very different shape. There is no Aral Sea at all. The Caspian Sea is oval-shaped. There are a large number of rivers and cities in the area of modern deserts, of which we have no idea.
We can definitely conclude that the Karakum and Kyzylkum desert areas were densely populated. There were mountains and cities, rivers and lakes. At the same time, rivers had quite a different direction from the present one.

text:
Financier J. P. Morgan was the owner of the White Star Line, and he invested a considerable amount of money in the Titanic. 

Before he set sail, he worked on a plan to create a U.S. Federal Reserve System to regulate the banking system.

Some were outspoken critics of Morgan's ideas, and all of these people booked a seat on the ship first. They were Benjamin Guggenheim, Isa Strauss, and David Astor.
Morgan and a few of his close friends canceled their trip on the Titanic at the last minute and survived. His opponents remained on board and died when the ship sank. 

The Federal Reserve was already established the following year, 1913.
This concerned the Rothschild family and even the Illuminati Society.
Bribing members of the crew - to sacrifice people's lives to accomplish their goals - was already a tradition.

And don't forget of course, the Titanic was insured...

text:
Unearthly physics versus earthly logic. The photo is Neil Armstrong's lunar footprint. It was left by a man weighing 77kg. Let's add the weight of space suit A7L, vest of life support system, which according to different data, weighed from 48 to 54kg and get the total weight of 120-131kg. The gravity of the Moon is 6 times less than on the Earth, so the weight of the astronaut in his outfit will be only about 20kg.

Wait, but the lunar soil consists of regolith: "A non-laminated, loose, mixed-grained clastic-dust layer, reaching a thickness of several tens of meters. It consists of fragments of erupted rocks, minerals, glass, meteorites, and breccias of shock-explosive origin, cemented by glass."

A curious researcher did an experiment at home on similar soil and his weight of over 90kg left an imprint of only a couple of mm. To squeeze a few centimeters of regolith with your shoe, you have to be an elephant or stand in a layer of some semi-liquid mortar.

text:
A giant fossilized snake was found?

A new cave has been discovered that has surprised many people with its surface resembling the scales of a giant snake, according to legends, once lived here. Naka Cave, is located in Bueng Hong Long District, Bueng Kan Province, about 700 km from Bangkok (Thailand). After its discovery, the mysterious serpent began to attract tourists and fans of mysticism from all corners of the earth, which attracted its amazing rough surface, similar to the giant scales of snakes.

Its existence is intertwined with echoes of the once-great Silicon World, with raging giant vegetation and completely unaccustomed forms of life, the memory of which today can be found only in legends. From the outside, the entrance to the cave is also shaped like a snake's head.

text:
How did bitcoin originate? 

Nobody knows. It just appeared. Out of nowhere.
No leaks, no announcements, no betas. No one saw the creator's face, no one knows what school he went to, no one had drinks with him in a bar. They say his name was Satoshi Nakamoto, and that's it.
In trying to solve the mystery of bitcoin's origin, people have created quite a few theories.

For example: Bitcoin is the creation of a group of Asian companies, namely Samsung, Toshiba, Nakamichi and Motorola. This is indicated by the first letters in the name of the companies. Sa is Samsung, Toshi is Toshiba, Naka is Nakamichi and Moto is Motorola. 

The scandalously famous programmer Laszlo Heinitz, the lucky owner of a pizza for 10 000 BTC, said that the bitcoin code was written too perfectly for one person.

text:
The Bolivian find is a large human skull of unusual shape and with a large brain volume. It is visually evident that the right and left frontal parts are enlarged. Judging by the size and color, the skull belongs to a man about 3 m tall, and the light color of the bone suggests an age of thousands of years. Interesting: it is believed that man in the course of evolution now has the largest brain volume, which also contradicts the ancient find.

The weak interest of scientists in such findings suggests that the full chain of human evolution is already known, but is not on display.

text:
The Temple of Hal Saflieni is located in Malta, and this prehistoric complex is almost 5,000 years old. In addition, it is one of the very few underground sanctuaries dating back to the Bronze Age. 

No one knows exactly what the hypogeum was built for, but the main theory is that it served as a shelter for the prophet and later a burial ground was organized here. 

What makes this place even more mysterious is its unusual properties, which make the sounds here perceived in an unusual way. There is a special room in the dungeon where all the lowest sounds resonate as loudly as if you were in the center of a giant bell, but outside of this room almost nothing can be heard. Was this the intention of the ancient people during the construction of the complex, or is it an unforeseen effect?

text:
Archaeologist Zeev Herzog, one of the most famous professors of the archaeology department of Tel Aviv University, issued a shocking conclusion: After the excavations it became clear: the Israelites had never been in Egypt, had never wandered in the desert, had never conquered the land. None of the central events of Jewish history were confirmed by what we found.

Hard to grasp was the historical document that the great kingdom of David and Solomon "does not correspond to reality."

"Jerusalem is all digged up. Excavations have yielded a tremendous amount of material preceding and following the existence of David's and Solomon's kingdom. Nothing confirms the fact of its existence, not a single shard of clay. This is not to say that archaeologists were looking in the wrong place. In the days of David and Solomon, Jerusalem was a large settlement with no central temple or royal palace."

text:
Our entire history is based on five 11th century chronicles. And, one of them, consists of only four surviving planks ("Novgorod codex" of 1015).

The other 4 :
- Ostromirov Gospel (1056).
- Svyatoslav's Izbornik (1073)
- Izbornik of Svyatoslav (1076)
- Archangel's Gospel (1092).

Earlier 11 century documentary information is absent. 

Scholars are left to use only works of 12-13-14 centuries and various "lists" (copies).
At the same time, there are over 300,000 old Latin manuscripts. Although they were burned and destroyed. 
And in schools we study the text of "The Tale of Bygone Years", rewritten an unknown number of times and unknown by whom.

In the pyramid of Cheops the researchers found a hole at a height of 2 m, inside of which everything was covered with shells. It is unlikely that the builders used a defective block for construction. The shells could have appeared if the base of the pyramid was in the water.

Approximately 10'000 years ago, due to melting of glaciers, the level of the world ocean rose by 70 meters, flooding, among other things, the lands of Egypt, and if so, what is the real age of the pyramids?

text:
Much has been said about the ice age, which covered the planet 13,000 years ago, but they cannot name the exact cause - changing currents, volcanoes, decreasing magnetic tension at the poles. What, however, does not explain the instant freezing in the ice of the same mammoths and 35 other species of animals. 

But "instant freezing" can be explained by findings in strata 13'000 years old. Vitrified carbon (melting at 3'500Â°C) with many gas bubbles is a sign of extremely high temperatures followed by sudden cooling. Spherules - hollow magnetic globules with a high concentration of carbon, which also require high temperatures and pressure to form. Nanodiamonds - Hexagonal diamonds require pressure of 2 million pounds per square inch (170'000 bar) and temperatures of 1000 to 1700Â°C followed by rapid cooling.

They told about the ice age, but forgot about the preceding high temperatures caused by some catastrophe?

text:
Grooves in the stones of Gotland

On the Swedish island of Gotland there are more than 3,600 stones with chamfers, notches or cuts.

Scientists' hypothesis: swords were sharpened on the stones and left such grooves. According to the marks on the stones, it appears that the sword was held perpendicular to the surface. But this is not conducive to sharpening. 

It is interesting that identical traces are found on the stone slopes of Gotland.

text:
The history of ancient Egypt is based on the dynastic lists of the pharaohs from the temple at Abydos, built by Pharaoh Seti 1 in the 14th-13th century B.C. All of the pharaohs listed their predecessors, which modern history for some reason does not account for. 

The Palermo stone was created 1,000 years before Seti 1. On the diorite slab are carved the names of 120 kings of the pre-dynastic era.

The Turin papyrus is poorly preserved, but we can read the names of 10 neteru gods on it. The dates of their reigns are also indicated, and at the end of the text the total is summed up: "Shemsu-Gor - 13'420 years, before Shemsu-Gor - 23'200 years, the total is 36'620 years.  Such terms of the ancient Egyptian civilization are not stacked in the accepted history of development of mankind.

The Egyptian priest Manetho in the 3rd century BC compiled a history of Egypt, where the history of the country was 24'925 years. 

And it was not the fantasy of one ancient historian.

text:
When were the railway tunnels actually built?

Officially the tunnel under the railway crossing appeared in 1875 in Sevastopol.

Imagine, 1860, the city destroyed to ruins. The Crimean War destroyed completely Nikolayevsky bastion, Malakhov kurgan tower, the fortifications of the Historical Boulevard.

Instead of reconstructing the city people are starting to make brick tunnels in places where they could just dig a passage? 

Probably underground tunnels appeared long before the 19th century.

text:
The South Pole was discovered by R. Amundsen's expedition in 1911?

It is believed that before him "the way to one of the most inaccessible places on Earth" no one could overcome.

We would argue. Look at old maps that show South America and Antarctica as continents connected by an isthmus. It was free to walk across it.

The present-day Drake Passage, the characteristic mark on the seafloor, and the strange arrangement of the islands suggest that South America and Antarctica may have been one land. 

The ancient peoples had no problem moving around. They walked farther and farther away.

text:
Sudden disappearance of the Sumerian civilization

According to archaeologists, the Sumerian civilization is as mysterious as the Mayan civilization. They appeared more than 7,000 years ago and invented the text before the Egyptian civilization.

Although the Sumerian civilization had early origins, the civilization mysteriously disappeared, and at present people can only speculate about their environment of survival and development. It is said that the Sumerian civilization may have returned to its parent star. 

There is also the opinion that some natural causes may have led to the disappearance of the Sumerian civilization, not necessarily that they actually came from an extraterrestrial planet.

There are at least three tall women in the picture. The central one is 22 years old and is 230 cm tall. The lady on the right is over six feet tall.

Judging by the unique exhibit from the National Museum of Natural History of France, not only traces of Patagonian giants are missing from history.

text:
Byliny, fairy tales, legends and myths were not born out of nothing...

Adherents of the theories about a race of giants, which lived on our planet millions of years ago, have received new evidence - a giant footprint was found on the territory of southern Africa. It was found in Swaziland. The footprint, like a human, reaches 120 centimeters in length. According to scientists, it could well have been left by a prehistoric giant. And Darwin's theory of evolution can now be thrown out of school textbooks, because it cannot explain it.

text:
Amateur historian Matt Sibson has made the bold assumption that there are hidden rooms beneath the Egyptian Sphinx. He believes that directly beneath the sculpture are several secret rooms that are connected to the pyramids.

Sibson stated that the Sphinx may be connected to the pyramids by an extensive network of rooms and tunnels. He suggested that the lost door might be a way to get inside the pyramids. He refers to documents that were written from an 1837 expedition by Egyptologist Howard Weiss. He writes in his book that he became aware that French engineers were conducting extensive excavations in front of the Sphinx. They managed to get to the secret door, but then the excavation was stopped.

He refers to documents that were written from an 1837 expedition by Egyptologist Howard Weiss. He writes in his book that he became aware that French engineers were conducting extensive excavations in front of the Sphinx. They managed to get to the secret door, but then the excavation was stopped.
Forbidden Science

text:
The mystery of the birth of the soul. What causes us to be born on Earth?

There is no "want" or "don't want" here. The soul perceives the necessity of incarnation as natural and necessary as a dream for us. it is a kind of instinct of cosmic scale. It strives for incarnation itself, as it is the only way to transform accumulated energies and get new experiences.

Not when the event has happened, but before the birth the choice has already been made and the events are predetermined. I would like to emphasize that parents give a child only a physical body and heredity at the level of physiology of the nation in which the soul is born.

At the moment when the time of birth (incarnation) comes, the soul sees its future life. Even if just for a moment, it sees all the connecting events and the whole burden of responsibility which it has to accept. And the more spiritually developed the soul is, the broader its access to the definition of the upcoming events in its life.

In the present, even a CNC machine would not do this. This was either cast or 3D printed. Marble. In the 17th century.

text:
In Spain, 18 km from Alicante, there is a dam called Tibi. 

The dam was built incredibly competently for its year of construction - 1580. Fourteen years later, the dam was completed. Not only is it arched-gravity type (according to modern classification) - it is also located on the river in the place where the river crosses a high rocky ridge. The dam rests against the rocky shores with its edges - and the water pressure is pushing it apart.

Can you imagine the complexity of calculations? Design institutes work on such constructions. And all modern dams and dikes are made of reinforced concrete. And here - stone blocks, the reliability of the construction made of them should be even higher!

Can you imagine how many blocks had to be cut down, shifted and laid? And all this for 14 years.

text:
A map of Russia made in the early 17th century from a drawing by Tsarevich Feodor Godunov hangs in Staraya Ladoga.

It was later used as the basis for maps of Muscovy in Europe. A couple of Tartarys and the Horde are on the map. The funny thing is that the map of Russian tsarevich with the signature about Tartaria completely contradicts the opinion of modern scientists about its existence. 

The tsar simply did not know that no Tartary existed on his territory. And his neighbors do not exist, and he does not trade with Tartars. Our historians will not lie

text:
Pakistani Sphinx.

An object that has already been dubbed the "Second Sphinx" was found in Pakistan. Immediately there were those who believe that this object, is a natural formation.

According to one version, its head is a portrait of the ancient Egyptian pharaoh who reigned 4500 years ago. Sphinx means Egyptian. Somehow it is hard to believe that the pharaoh decided to reassign himself as someone else's pyramid keeper.

To consider the Pakistani Sphinx a natural formation, a simple coincidence of forms would be possible, if its head had no obvious traces of machining. And the rock under its base is characterized by flat symmetric columns and stepped treatment of niches. A coincidence? Two objects next to the traces of processing rules out any possibility that this is a natural formation.

It remains to convince the scientific community, they have enough of the problematic Sphinx in Egypt.

A total of 57 people from Hillary and Bill Clinton's inner circle have died in strange circumstances in the last 30 years.

All of the victims on the "Clinton List" had information that could potentially ruin the couple's careers.

Wolf Messing at a speech in Warsaw in 1937 said: "If Hitler goes to war in the East, he will be killed.

A year and a half before the invasion of the USSR by German troops, he foresaw the victory of the Soviet people in the war.

text:
Elongated Skulls

Many enthusiasts enthusiastically call elongated skulls evidence of forbidden archaeology. And some of them even believe that they are proof that the real history of mankind is in fact hidden from the people. But who, and more importantly, why is hiding the truth from us? Why are bizarre and unusual skull deformities ignored by scientists? And why do they persistently refuse to search for the truth?

Among the most interesting examples of elongated skulls are the so-called skulls of the Paracas culture. They were discovered in the province of Pisco, Peru, almost a century ago. Once upon a time, the Inca Empire flourished in these places. These skulls are thought to be about 3,000 years old. And DNA tests have allegedly shown that the elongated skulls of the Paracas culture belong to a completely unknown to science human species.

text:
The terracotta army is an interesting subject. It's kind of there, but the technology to make it isn't.

Researchers have found that each sculpture was first shaped, so it was fired, glazed and painted. But the researchers couldn't find a single kiln for firing, and to produce 8,000 statues would have required an entire production complex. But the production complex, again, does not match the level of development of China of that era that historians claim.

text:
The rock on the Yugourt Plateau in Tunisia attracts you with its view. Not the view of its surroundings, but the view of the pattern of its peak. Let us compare the intricate pattern with the annual rings of stumps, remember the petrified leaves, larger than human height, add here the information about petrified trees and we can safely ask the question: why are scientists sure that this is a mountain and not a petrified stump?

I don't trust the idea of silicon life, but the accumulation of silicon in organics - why not?

text:
In Catherine's Palace, stoves appeared much later than the building, and antique fireplaces are now called "decorative" if there is no hood. 

At different times, in different countries, there is a common fireplace feature - a metal plate on the back wall and metal goblets. We think of atmospheric electricity: from the roof down a pipe we run metal ties into the metal sheet frame. When we bring the goblets closer to the frame, an eddy current is induced in it, as in the proverb "don't need neither firewood nor a beam, you can live without a crunch".

Although, after the prohibition of ether and wood to heat useful. But you have to buy a couple of wagons of firewood for one palace..

text:
Entry from 2013.

"I had two coronary artery aneurysms, after all. And the doctors had to literally cut my head open. They took a saw and sawed off the top. And then they went in and found those arteries. One was already leaking. Both were on the verge of bursting. I remember being taken to the operating room for a long time, and I asked the doctor at the time... I swear I wasn't lying! I asked him, "What are my chances of getting off the table okay?" And he said, "Well, let's just say you have a much better chance of surviving" - Biden.

That explains it, he came off the table insane!

text:
Rockets, and multistage ones at that, were still in the 17th century. 

Fairy tales? No. It's a fact.
All this was described and published by Kazimir Semyonovich even 250 years before the appearance of Tsiolkovsky's works. It describes rockets from products with a stabilizing rod to winged rockets. It also elaborated the theory of creating a prototype of a multistage rocket. But that's not all. Back in the 18th century there were legends of fights with fire-breathing dragons. And it turns out this is not a fairy tale - there was such a weapon. 

Therefore, a global, and perhaps even nuclear, war could be in the not-too-distant future. Everything for this was already there. 

For the most inquisitive I will leave the original PDF of his work here

text:
The CIA's "Heart Attack Gun".

 A secret "needle gun" firing micro-caliber poisoned Javette arrows. When hit in the body, the arrow would quickly dissolve almost without trace, having previously infused the blood with a toxin that caused cardiac arrest. Considering that the caliber of the arrow was 0.03 inch (0.7 mm) or even less, traces from such a hit were very difficult to find.

text:
In 1971, the Rosenkreuz Museum in California came into possession of a perfectly preserved mummy. The study showed that 2,600 years ago, the Egyptians had performed a complex surgical operation, a prohibitive level of complexity for that era. The mummy had a 23cm metal orthopaedic pin in his knee.

Quite a modern technology that was known to the ancient Egyptians, but unknown to their descendants. Too much technology accumulates that shows the high level of development of ancient peoples and subsequent oblivion. In fact, humanity is forced to rediscover long-known but lost knowledge from thousands of years ago.

So were the ancestors so primitive if we are only reaching their level of development?

text:
Almost all maps prior to the 18th century depicted Japan as several times larger than it is today, and called the island Iapan.

It is interesting that the official history does not deny the existence of a larger island on the site of Japan, but it was supposedly at least 12,000 years ago, not 300 years ago.

But if this is true, why on all maps in the XV-XVI centuries it was Iapan? And why does the map show the same city names as in modern Japan? By the way, the population of the island is described with a different culture and a different appearance, if you compare it with the current Japanese.

text:
The mysterious Yamal-Nenets sinkholes

In 2014, a hole was discovered in the Yamal-Nenets Autonomous District, which was popularly nicknamed the "black hole. Several helicopters can descend into the depths at once.
Several versions of its origin have emerged: a meteorite, an atomic bomb explosion, a karst sinkhole.

Scientists have conducted studies, according to which the size of the pit on the inner edge of about 40 meters, on the outer - 60. They also found the presence of an internal explosion (fragments of soil were found 120 meters from the edge of the "black hole"). Scientists were able to go down to a depth of 200 meters and take samples for chemical analysis.

It turned out that Yamal "black hole" is covered from the inside with a layer of ice of unknown composition. The analyses of the air in the crater were favorable for the birth of new life. This is evidenced by the absence of harmful impurities and dangerous gases!

text:
The Greek mathematician, astronomer, and head of the Library of Alexandria, Erastopheanus of Cyrene, who lived in the 3rd-2nd centuries B.C., is believed to have calculated the Earth's meridian and determined the size of our planet with incredible accuracy. 

However, in the 15th century, Columbus believed the earth was three times smaller than it really is. An amazing fact that is not explained by historians - why did not Columbus know that? The full sense is that the story of Eratosthenes' calculations came from the same author who wrote about how Fibonacci cleverly counted fractions before they were even known to mathematicians.

text:
As many people know, history states that in the past peoples lived in their own places, exchanging knowledge across oceans was almost unrealistic, but how true is this?

Most people don't know how much overlap there is in technology and culture between peoples thousands of years ago who were across oceans and thousands of miles apart

One such technology is metal staples with a variety of compositions. Such staples were supposedly used to bind megaliths and walls, but how were they introduced into the rock? And in general, how effective were they? And why were they used by different peoples? - No answers.

text:
Giant ancient ships at the bottom of the lake

In Italy, a large-scale archaeological expedition was conducted on Lake Nemi in the early 20th century. A ship 60 meters long and 20 meters wide was discovered. It had marble columns, floors and statues, and ceramic pipes installed to heat the floors. Surprisingly, the hull was triple planked with lead in 54 AD. But scientists, as always, are in their repertoire, they said it was a floating temple.

text:
A race of two-headed giants

A mummy of a humanoid giant was found in Patagonia. It is now preserved in a private collection in Baltimore. Where and from whom the humanoid was born is unknown. But, according to extant records, it was captured by Spanish sailors who arrived in Patagonia in 1637. The humanoid is 3.5 meters tall, about twice the height of modern humans, and also has two heads. 

What turns out, giants lived and met on the territory of the entire globe only 400 years ago.

text:
The burial of aliens by ancient civilizations. 

Very often when conducting excavations, scientists come across such finds, which cause great interest and amazement. 

That is how archaeologists came across the remains of a mummy, which could not be attributed to human remains. Apparently, the ancient Egyptians possessed the secrets of extraterrestrial technology, which are not known to the human eye. It is likely that these were gifts from alien aliens from other planets. Most interestingly, there is evidence of the latter. 

In one tomb in Egypt, a mummy was found 2.5 meters tall, without ears, nose or tongue. Along with the mummy in the tomb were found objects that caused scientists to break their heads. 

In the tomb lay a smooth disc of metal, painted with signs and symbols. The deciphering of these signs gave no result. Also found in the tomb were the remains of clothing made of metal and plastic, images of space bodies and flying vehicles on the clay, which no one had seen before.

text:
The Vatican Library is one of the most guarded sites in the world: its protection is more serious than that of any existing nuclear power plant. In addition to numerous Swiss guards, the library is guarded by modern automatic systems that form several levels of security. 

 The secret archives of the Vatican became known in 1611 under Pope Paul V. Only a limited number of people could get in. Some scientists with a letter of recommendation can get into the holy of holies, but the entrance is regulated and allows two people per year. At the same time, the entrance to the archive does not imply free movement and access to any documents. The visitor indicates the topic of interest, and the appropriate literature is selected.
 This insularity raises questions and leads to theories about what the Vatican archives are really storing.
 Probably the library of Ivan the Terrible and the Library of Alexandria are kept there.

text:
An unknown ancient platform in Petra, Jordan. 

Inside the large platform is a smaller platform that was once paved with stone slabs. There used to be a row of columns on the east side of the inner platform, which were at the top of a giant staircase .
Inside the platform there is a small 8.5m by 8.5m building, centrally located, running north and south, with a door facing east and facing the giant staircase.

This giant platform is not like Petra or its surroundings. The amount of work involved in the construction of this platform is enormous, although the most important building itself is small.

text:
How should we read the writings and poems of the ancient philosophers? Change the name of the deity to "cosmic incident" and the "burning chariot" to an asteroid/meteorite and rejoice in the extraordinary testimony of the ancients.

The Athenian playwright Sophocles in the 5th century wrote Atreus where "Zeus...changed the course of the sun, making it rise in the east, not in the west" - and before that it was in the west? Interesting!

The ancient Greek playwright Euripides wrote Elektra in the 5th century, "Zeus rose in anger, turning the stars back and even the blindingly burning chariot of the sun. The flash of his flying chariot lit up the face of the fading day with scarlet light.... the sun turned back."

text:
Gagarin didn't fly into space: Fake or true?

It turns out that the smiling Smolensk superman did not fly anywhere - he was just shown to the people to cover up the failure of the space program?

Gagarin's debunker is the Hungarian writer Istvan Nemere. He argues that the spaceship "Vostok" was not launched on April 12, 1961, but a few days earlier, and the first Soviet cosmonaut was a test pilot, Vladimir Ilyushin.

It is claimed that Ilyushin made an emergency landing, after which he looked so unpresentable that the Soviet authorities had to call in the reserve in the form of Yuri Gagarin, who was simply appointed the first earthly cosmonaut.

Anyway, you can find people online who do not recognize Neil Armstrong and Gagarin's flight. Surely among them are those who believe that all astronauts are bought, otherwise the world would have learned long ago that the planet is not round.

text:
Even before the development of Babylonian astronomy, the states of Sumer and Akkad, which preceded the Babylonian state, had made great advances in astronomy.

The Babylonians used these advances as the basis for their own astronomy.
A large number of clay tablets with astronomical texts have come down to us. 
These tablets remained in the ground for a long time (by the way, without destroying themselves and without attracting attention). They began to be investigated only 150 years ago, and not so long ago began to decipher and study in detail the texts preserved on them. As a result of deciphering, it became clear that in Mesopotamia there was an original system of constellations and that the modern system of constellations, which we borrowed from the ancient Greeks, owes much to it.

text:
China's 7,000-year heritage

They are some of the earliest and largest groups of petroglyphs in the world.Together, the petroglyphs form an art gallery, stretching for about a thousand kilometers.

The total number of petroglyphs of Yinshan exceeds 50,000, and it is the largest cluster of rock art in the world.Most of the images are in the Hari mountain range, stretching 5 kilometers, on Black Mountain.

The petroglyphs of Yinshan have a variety of subjects.

For example, they depict birds, animals, horseback riding and hunting, grazing, warfare, dancing, and everyday scenes. There are also depictions of the sun, moon, stars, various symbols and signs, deities and caves.

It remains unknown who left these petroglyphs for us and whether we fully understand their meaning.

text:
A couple of years ago, a unique sarcophagus made of lead was discovered in France. The object is at least 1,500 years old, and in all that time no one has opened it and no air or earth has gotten inside.

Scientists said that since it was airtight, the contents might have been well preserved, and they would soon find out what was inside.

Years went by, no information ever appeared in the media, and everyone forgot about the find. Have they been opening the sarcophagus all these years?

text:
Overlaying old maps on modern terrain, finding old Tartarian cities would be difficult. How can you not believe in point impacts on the planet, when perfectly flat craters are at the site of each city?

In Siberia, such sinkholes often become "devil's lakes". In Mongolia, on the other hand, rivers and lakes often dry up, and the craters clearly show that only flat land, different in color from the surrounding area, is left in place of the city. Space bodies enter the atmosphere at an inclination, and to imagine that thousands of fragments fall all over the planet at right angles, leaving a crater of 5-7 km. is something from the realm of science fiction. They didn't manually tear down the mountains and earth with a shovel, did they?

text:
The Arch of Constantine in Rome.
Abraham-Louis-Rodolphe Ducrot (1748-1810)

Such artists are called "ruinists" by scholars. Allegedly, they made it all up and painted it. That's the style. But this excuse only works for those who cannot analyze information.

Let us look at the picture carefully. What we see: the arch itself and the aftermath of the catastrophe. The ruined Colosseum in the background. Judging by the vegetation on the buildings, the picture was painted 30-40 years after the catastrophe. A thick layer of brought clay or silt, most likely by a wave. The water is gone, and people are starting to come back. 

Now this arch stands excavated in the same place, only slightly restored. There are dozens if not hundreds of such paintings and they all depict the same thing - the catastrophe of the 17-18 centuries and the loss of the ancient civilization. After everything subsided, the age of industry began, which was really about restoring lost technology, not inventing it.

text:
Excerpt from history: the doors from the Curia of Julia, moved in 1660 and made the central gate of the Roman Basilica of St. John Lateran, Rome.

The photo shows their gigantic size, with handles at human height and a locking latch at... I don't know whose height would be adequate to safely close the latch, but 4 average human heights fit comfortably within that height. The deadbolt is on the inside of the gate and you can't close it quickly if you need to (e.g., in case of an attack).

I would listen to the official version of the location of the deadbolt at that height. And about those doors, too.

text:
In Tula, the ancient capital of the Toltecs, enormous five-meter basalt columns in the form of warriors, mounted on a stepped platform, called "statues of Atlantes", are still preserved.

"Atlantean statues" attract researchers with strange "outfits" and objects, which historians interpret as cult-religious (symbols of priests - Toltecs), and representatives of alternative views consider objects of highly developed civilization.

In the center is a pneumatic jackhammer.

text:
A masterpiece of Russian architecture, 120 km from Moscow, which no one knows about 

In the small Belavino village, Orekhovo-Zuevo district, Moscow region, is a small and inconspicuous masterpiece of wooden Russian architecture, the house of the merchant Egorov, late 19th - early 20th century.

We are constantly talking about Western architecture, while forgetting about our own heritage, we roll it in siding and put plastic windows instead of the original. How so? Russia gave the world a whole direction of wooden architecture, but for some reason everyone forgets about it.

text:
Rama Bridge.

On the bottom of the Strait of Polk near Sri Lanka satellite photos revealed an underwater bridge 50 km long. Ptolemy's ancient geographical maps show such a structure connecting the mainland to the island. Today this bridge passes underwater at depths of up to 12 meters. 

The Indians called the structure "Rama's Bridge. It is clearly marked on geographical maps of the Middle Ages. The bridge was mentioned in the manuscripts of Marco Polo, who reached China in his time. If you analyze the ancient Indian epic Ramayana, it talks about the construction of the "bridge of Nala". There are legends of ancient India that have come down to our time. Oral tales tell of giant (up to 8 meters tall) monkeys who built the bridge within five days. Stones and logs were used as materials for construction. The monkeys organized themselves into an army and crossed from the mainland to the island of Ceylon.

text:
Victor Schauberger was a simple forester who made the fundamental discoveries of the 20th century and, with his whirling technique, discovered completely new sources of energy for mankind.

He did not trust the energy monopolists and was afraid that they would increase their power at the expense of his discoveries by hiding them from mankind.

His goal was to make atomic energy unnecessary by means of explosive destruction. He considered it the greatest danger.
For example, from one cubic meter of water in a second you could get at least 4000 kW of thermal energy.
 As soon as he succeeded, the authorities took away his research. This happened to him 12 times. Or his discoveries disappeared without a trace. In a letter written just before his death, Victor Schauberger bitterly remarked: 
"All science with all its lackeys is but a gang of thieves, pulled by strings like puppets, and forced to dance to any tune that passes off its well-hidden slave master as a necessity."

text:
Throughout the world there are voids, caves and catacombs, in one way or another, connected to each other. New entrances and branches are constantly being found. 

Many caves connected to each other, are in the Middle East, China, Iran, India, Europe, Afghanistan, USA, Russia and many other countries.

By results of the conducted expeditions of researches of the underground world, it has appeared that directly under our feet there are thousands of tunnels which we do not even suspect. Through these tunnels can go to any country, on any continent. Tunnels that run not only under the surface of the earth, but also under the seas and oceans, according to many scientists, are created with the help of high technology that we can not even in the 21st century. The tunnels are not just manually bored, but as if burnt out, which can be seen on the molten walls.

In our time, builders stumble upon the "underground world" by building subways under the capitals of many nations.

text:
Varangal Fort in India.

It is an ancient complex with uniquely complex architecture. It consists mainly of ruins with interesting elements.

The whole fort is made of granite. Hence the question how in the 12th century, people were able to process and carve such complex elements on such a difficult to handle stone? According to the official version, of course, everything is on the face here - the simplest work with a hammer and jigsaw.

But it seems to me that there is no smell of handwork here.

text:
Jihlava Catacombs in the Czech Republic. Unknown organ music

Jihlava catacombs are man-made underground structures of the town of Jihlava in South Moravia. The beginning of the construction of catacombs dates back to XIII century.

The main sensation was the discovery of the "glowing staircase" in one of the least explored underground passages, the existence of which was unknown even to the locals. Taken samples of material did not confirm the presence of phosphorus.

According to eyewitnesses, at first glance the staircase does not make an impression - nothing special - but gradually it begins to emit an intensifying reddish-orange light.

Perhaps there, deep underground, in some undiscovered dungeon, something intelligent still dwells, and the unknown organ music confirms it...

text:
1st century steam engine

There lived in Egypt in the 1st century A.D. a scientist, engineer, mechanic, mathematician and simply a genius - Heron of Alexandria. He invented, for a moment: vending machines for holy water, automatic doors for temples, a distance meter, a fire pump, fountains, and... a steam engine. 

The device was a cauldron of water, a fire was built under it, the water boiled and the steam gushed out and spun the device. Modern replicas made according to Geron's drawings were spun up to 3,500 rpm. The level of technology and scientific thought was such that official science was able to reach the steam engine anew only in the 19th century.

Modern replicas made according to Geron's drawings were spun up to 3,500 rpm. The level of technology and scientific thought was such that official science was able to reach the steam engine anew only in the 19th century.

text:
The interest in Mahenjo-Daro reached its peak when it was possible to study the excavated ruins from above. 

There was a trace of an inexplicably powerful wave. The walls and buildings were melted to greenish glass in some places. The skeletons of people were in their natural lifetime poses. Only those in the streets were frozen, their hands covering their faces. All this affected the outcome of the scientists' conclusions.
For about two years after the study, the data was not made public. 

However, some time later, the verdict was released to the world. Mohenjo-Daro - destroyed by a nuclear explosion. Other scientists who have studied the remains have also supported this version. 

The bones contained radioactive particles 50 times larger than normal.

text:
A map with the continents of Liberia and Asgard.

Strange as it may seem, Hitler was convinced of the existence of more advanced civilizations of the past, and wanted to find the knowledge and technology of the past.

But the most interesting thing begins after the Germans visited Tibet and the monks, who supposedly had something to tell them about past civilizations.

Immediately afterwards, the Ahnenerbe headed for Antarctica, and judging by documents and maps, they tried to get into the hollow part of the Earth through a passage in the glaciers. To what extent this succeeded is unknown, as is whether or not anything can be found there at all.

But purely for coincidence, it is strange that right after Tibet, Hitler became interested in Antarctica, and together with the maps headed for the mysterious continent. In any case, it is impossible to know the truth.

Immediately afterwards, the Ahnenerbe headed for Antarctica, and judging by documents and maps, they tried to get into the hollow part of the Earth through a passage in the glaciers. To what extent this succeeded is unknown, as is whether or not anything can be found there at all.

But purely for coincidence, it is strange that right after Tibet, Hitler became interested in Antarctica, and together with the maps headed for the mysterious continent. In any case, it is impossible to know the truth.
Forbidden Science

text:
An Ancient Nuclear Vault in Africa 
 
Today there is a lot of evidence that previously there was a culture on our planet, much more developed than now. 
 
One such evidence is a nuclear waste repository that was found in Gabon in 1972. Its return is thought to be 1.8 billion years old. 
 
Scientists changed their minds about the origin of the burial ground when they conducted a thorough analysis of the rock. The source of radiation is uranium-235, covered with a thick layer of basalt, as an insulator. Almost the same technology was used in early nuclear waste repositories. 
 
Specialists are trying to find more evidence for their hunch that the repository is man-made, and if it is confirmed, our ideas about the past will have to change.

text:
Varashev Stone is a granite block in the shape of a regular parallelepiped, which lies on the shore of Lake Ladoga. It used to serve as a border between Sweden and Russia, Russia and Finland, and even earlier between the Finno-Ugric tribes - Vesja and Korela

The fact that it is a creation of human hands was not in doubt in the old days. Academician Ozeretskovsky in the 18th century wrote: "...in 12 versts near the shore is a great stone called Varashev, the base of which the lake water understands.

It has a certain quadrangular shape and is a kind of red granite. This stone is undoubtedly made by human hands, as it is the only one here and for a long way there is no other stone, moreover, there are letters cut on it's upper surface, stating the year and they are presented here".

Now this rectangular machined megalith is considered a natural formation. Wonderful logic, the builder is not found, so it is natural!

Mystic Grove

The Grove is located in northern California and covers an area of 11 km. sq. km. But it is believed that many of the world's elite are members of the club. Since 1988, the world's most influential people have come to this place every year for two weeks to spend their vacation. To become a member of the club, you have to stand in line for 15 years. 

Bohemian Grove is one of the most frightening and secret places 

The symbol of this place is an owl 40 feet high made of cement. Every year sacrifices are made near it. For the first time journalist Alex Jones was able to capture on camera all that is happening in Bohemian Grove. He saw a man being burned alive as a sacrifice there. The powerful took part in this action. More horrible things have happened in Bohemian Grove. The club was seriously guarded on all sides. After Alex Johnson, no strangers have been allowed into the club.

text:
The Mystery of the Missing Submarine K-129.

The Soviet strategic nuclear-armed submarine disappeared without a trace in 1968 while carrying out combat missions off the U.S. coast. 
The search for the missing submarine yielded no results, and the entire crew of 98 was declared missing. 
This episode is considered the most mysterious and closed in the Soviet submarine fleet. The exact cause of the disaster is unknown to this day.

Documentary: "Missing Submarine. The tragedy of K-129" describes this incident in great detail.

text:
Mysterious signal: the human brain is capable of transmitting an encoded signal unknown to science

A unique type of signal has been found in the human brain that scientists knew nothing about before. It represents a unique form of cellular connections. This discovery was called amazing, it allows us to understand that the brain is a much larger computational machine than previously thought.

Patients diagnosed with epilepsy were involved. Using fluorescence microscopy, they were able to identify individual cells in the cerebral cortex that use a combination of positively charged ions to form calcium dendritic actions. The human brain is often compared to a computer: both use the force of electrical voltage to perform various operations. The computer receives current through electrical wires.

text:
The Medieval Image of Mickey Mouse

The official birth of Mickey Mouse is considered to be the day when "Steamboat Willie" was shown on the screens in 1928. It was in this cartoon viewers first saw the beloved later hero. And who in his right mind would say that the cartoon could draw over 700 years ago? And yet it's true.

It is as true as the fact that along with the famous island of Malta, there is a town of the same name in Austria. It was there, during the works on restoration of the local church, where the drawing of the mouse was found.

So, let's get into details. In Malta, an Austrian city, which is located in the federal state of Carinthia, there is a little church. It was built in the 13th century and is dedicated to the Blessed Virgin Mary. Not so long ago, the local authorities decided to carry out repairs in the religious building, because of its rather respectable age.

text:
Leonardo's Leicester Codex

The Leicester Codex is a notebook of scientific notes made by Leonardo da Vinci in Milan in 1506-1510. The manuscript consists of 18 sheets of paper, scribed on both sides, that make up a 72-page notebook. 

Leonardo's notes are written in his own mirror handwriting, which is the only way to read them. The notes focus on the various phenomena about which Leonardo pondered: why the moon shines, how and why water flows in rivers, where fossils come from, what minerals are made of, and so on. 

The notebook also contains many mathematical calculations, diagrams, and drawings. 

In 1994, the codex was put up for auction, in which it was purchased by Microsoft founder Bill Gates for $30.8 million.

text:
The Barabar cave system in India. 200 to 300 B.C. 

The caves are carved in gneiss, as hard as granite. Vaults, floors, and ceilings are polished to a shine. The acoustics and ventilation of the caves are ideal. There are reservoirs for water and hermetic closing of the doorways. There is a version that the caves were used in ancient times as a bomb shelter. The vaults are capable of withstanding a nuclear strike. Ancient skeletons with high levels of radiation are often found in the vicinity.

text:
No famous legend is without mentioning giants.

In the famous English fairy tale "Jack and the Beanpot" giants lived among the clouds, the ancient Greeks kept the sky on their shoulders and fought with the gods, Lemuel Gulliver visited North America, where giants lived, and was himself such a midget, the Japanese considered the first Europeans demonic giants "they", and Canadians and Americans have invented a fabulous hero - a giant woodcutter Paul Bunyan.

How did people on different continents get similar legends about giants? It is quite possible that they are the remnants of memories of ancient civilizations. Medieval Danish historian Saxon Grammaticus (1150-1220) suggested that giants really did exist - otherwise how to explain the cyclopean structures of antiquity?
And the brain is so constructed that it cannot generate what it is not familiar with. 
People are incapable of making up a tale of non-existent phenomena without any background information.

Unusual Japanese Dogu statuettes and their eye-eyed counterparts from French Polynesia from the island of Nuku Hiva.

text:
According to the official version, the human race came from Africa, where the remains of the first Homo Naledi humans were discovered. It was in Africa 270,000 years ago that modern humans appeared. 

But a study of the vertebrae of one of the extinct human species, 1.5 million years old, puts the hypothesis of African origin of humans in doubt. It states that humans began migrating to Eurasia millions of years ago (even before Homo Sapiens appeared). The simple conclusion from this study is that Homo sapiens could have evolved not only in Africa, but also on any other continent.

text:
The Kvarkush Plateau is located on the border of the Perm region and the Sverdlovsk region at an altitude of more than 1,000 m. Who expects to see the usual landscape of the mountain tundra will be pleasantly surprised by stone placers. 

These "natural formations" do not simply resemble artificially hewn stones with their smooth faces and cuts, but also bear traces of sawing... 

How did this stone end up in a remote and inaccessible mountainous area? If the next expert from academic history tries to explain these traces by the ancient activities of the known to science Uralic peoples, let him first repeat such a thing with primitive copper tools.

text:
The Sumerian texts show that in a very distant time, alien gods established their colony on Earth, which they called Kee. Fifty aliens were first sent to Earth. They were called the Anu-na-ki. They were led by Anu's eldest son, En-ki (lord of Earth). According to the King's List, Enki's reign in Eridu lasted 28,000 years. Subsequently, however, Anu's sterner younger son En-lil (lord of the air) was placed over him. Enlil increased the colony of aliens on Earth, and placed some in Earth orbit:

"Three hundred he placed in the heavenly watch...
And on earth he placed six hundred."

text:
A puzzle for scientists was found in Shelbyville, Illinois, USA. The town was founded in 1827, which is very recent by historical standards.

How the town ended up 4-5 meters above ground is a mystery. It seems that it was built recently, the sea and oceans are far away, typhoons do not reach the center of the country. There is, however, a lake about a kilometer from the city, but in order for it to reach the city and turn it into a small Atlantis, it will take a whole sea of water to pour into it.

The excavated structure itself is also impressive - the arched openings, columns, and red bricks seem vaguely familiar. In most of the excavated cities, surprisingly, the buildings are built as if from a template.

text:
This seventeenth-century engraving of Jesus Christ wearing a crown of thorns is titled "One with a single line. Indeed, what from a distance resembles an ordinary drawing is, up close, an image created with a single line that spirals in a spiral. All details of the face and transitions of light and shadow are created with the help of thickening of this line. The author of the work is the French artist Claude Mellan.

For the artist's contemporaries, his method of engraving remained a mystery, and no one has been able to repeat it.

text:
"Sculptural compositions were cast from cast iron, created using a special technology, the secret of which has been lost," says Alexander Kibovsky, head of the Department of Cultural Heritage of Moscow: "The secret of the cast iron, made in the 19th century, could not be revealed even today, given all the high technology of today. It has never been possible to determine the exact composition of the alloy...".

Do they want to convince us that, having a sample of the metal, experts could not determine its chemical composition? This kind of analysis is done in an ordinary laboratory in a metallurgical shop. The whole procedure takes no more than 20 minutes. Any sample, any metal. But the secret of the alloying technology itself can be really hard to unravel.

text:
Have you ever looked closely at the mountains of the Abkhazian coast? 

I am not hinting at anything, but the spoils do not have clear facets, and nature does not build identical "pyramids" by the force of wind and water. Under similar hills were the pyramids of Mesoamerica, so now look many pyramids of China. Have the officials never had the desire to dig suspiciously flat edges of these "natural formations"?

text:
History of vending

The first known vending machine was created as far back as the first century AD by Greek mathematician and inventor Heron of Alexandria. The machine was made at the request of priests of one of the temples and was intended for selling water blessed by priests to parishioners.

When a visitor to the temple dropped a coin into the machine, it landed on a special tray attached to a lever. Under the weight of the coin, the lever would actuate and open a valve to drain the water, connected to the other end of the lever. When the coin slipped off the tray, the lever would return to its original state and the valve would close.

text:
Few people think about it, but in fact, most of everything that exists at the moment appeared in just 200 years, given that the Earth is billions of years old.

History does not particularly explain this incredible "growth" of our civilization in 200 years, but such a fact is quite strange.

Only in the XIX century worldwide were built kilometers of railroads, thousands of houses, various buildings, and all this allegedly for about 100 years.

However, all this "mega" XIX century, is almost the same buildings around the world, which seemed to be just stamped, and the ancient architecture and remains incomprehensible to our "most advanced" civilization. Although for some reason it is very similar in different parts of the world, on different continents.

text:
Collusion between scientists and sugar industry owners uncovered in U.S.
More evidence that conspiracy theories can sometimes reflect the truth

The sugar industry has paid scientists handsomely for "correct" research that says all heart problems come from fatty diets. In the U.S., they are discussing how the truth about the harmful effects of sugar has been hidden for half a century.

It turns out that back in the 1960s, the sugar industry paid scientists handsomely to publish "correct" studies. 

Representatives of the sugar industry, back in the mid-1960s, developed a plan to deliberately shift public attention toward fatty foods as the main cause of cardiovascular disease.

Bunker-703 of the USSR Foreign Ministry in Moscow 

Located at a depth of 43 meters and only opened to the public since 2018, and before that time many of the most important international documents were stored in it.

Now it has a museum, which anyone can visit.

It is located here: 2nd Novokuznetsky lane, 14, bldg. 1, Moscow

The problem is that the first central power plant in New York City wasn't commissioned until nine years later. Before that the whole building was lit by the holy spirit?

text:
Daniel Keller's map of 1590 is valuable not only for the outlines of the countries, but also for the signatures left by the cartographer. 

"Sarmatia Asiatica and Scythia had long been inhabited, with the Persians and the Medes continually waging war and with their surrounding neighbors. The Sarmatians and Scythians fought Alexander the Great with great fanaticism, but very hard."

"Beyond the Volga to the east opposite the Caucasus Mountains live the great Tartars, the chief and oldest of which are the Yezahadars, the Perekops, the Kozans, the Nagai and the Cossacks, collectively they are called the Horde. "

"The islands of Yapan, which Marco Polo calls Zipangri...pay tribute to the Great Ham" - I can already see the Japanese sailing to get a yoke to reign.

"The Hungarians descended from the Yugros" - yes, yes, the ancestors of the Slavs populated Europe. Historians don't like it, but the evidence is already too much.

Article Title:

"Electricity Derived from Air Drives Car."

This is Nikola Tesla's 1921 Pierce-Arrow electric car, powered by pure etheric electricity. It is a self-charging car; it does not run on batteries, oil, or gas.

Electric cars have been around much longer than many people think. It's not even a myth, just a cover-up of lost technology.

text:
In the photo you can see two babies: Horus, the god of ancient Egypt, on the left, and Jesus on the right. And besides the scene depicted, they have quite a lot in common. Here are some facts for you.

Horus was born to the virgin mother Isis in a cave, Jesus was born to the virgin mother Mary in a manger (a stable for cattle).

Horus was born by the star Sirius, and Jesus was born by the "star in the East."

Horus tried to kill Seth, but Isis fled to the island of Chammis, and Jesus tried to kill Herod, and Mary fled to Egypt (!).

Neither Horus nor Jesus was married or had children.

What is the point of all this? Because the coincidence of so many facts of life (and there are many more) is not coincidental. Perhaps it is the same real moment in history, described by different people and adapted for different peoples to their realities...

text:
Overlaying old maps on modern terrain, finding old Tartarian cities would be difficult. How can you not believe in point impacts on the planet, when perfectly flat craters are in place of each city?

In Siberia, such sinkholes often become "devil's lakes". In Mongolia, on the other hand, rivers and lakes often dry up and the craters clearly show that only flat land, different in color from the surrounding area, is left in place of the city. Space bodies enter the atmosphere at an inclination, and to imagine that thousands of fragments fall all over the planet at right angles, leaving a crater of 5-7 km. is something from the realm of science fiction. They didn't manually tear down the mountains and earth with a shovel, did they?
