text:
Parkas' elongated skulls were finally sent for DNA analysis. Let me tell you right away that they turned out to be human. Although no alien DNA was found in the skulls, the results were able to stump scientific traditionalists. 

All the skulls belonged to the Native Americans, but in the DNA found traces of haplogroups that lived in the Black and Caspian Seas, and in the foothills of the Caucasus. How the ancestors of the Indians 3,000 years ago crossed the Bering Strait and reached the Pacific Coast of South America, scientists are not specified. 

As, indeed, it is not specified why the volume of the skull of the Indians is 1.5 times larger than usual, there is no sagittal suture and traces of artificial deformation.

text:
This video was taken by a French astronomer using a telescope that observed the crescent moon in daylight through thin clouds.

Three objects rise above the edge of the moon, fly over the surface of the moon, and disappear into the shadows.

This video has been sparking controversy among people for two years now. Some people think it's Photoshopped. And others say it's a real UFO.

An object similar in shape to a flying saucer has been discovered in the Libyan desert.

When looking at the maps, the object that clearly stands out against the background of the rock catches the eye. Its shape is reminiscent of the classic flying saucer that we see in movies or described in fantasy books. 

Approximate diameter of the find is about 40-46 meters. This allows us to determine the possibilities of the map.

text:
The sign of Allatra.

It is a circle with an inverted crescent underneath it. It is found on almost every continent: in the architecture of buildings, on mosques, on stupas, on churches. 

This suggests that knowledge used to be unified. Perhaps that's why they don't tell anything about this sign in rewritten history classes? 

And yet it is one of the few surviving evidence that we are one big family. And we are united as humanity.

text:
The first electric lighting in cities appeared in 1879-1880

To provide such illumination as in the photos and engravings, it was necessary to conduct equipment, set up, start production before that and produce a colossal amount of bulbs, wires and the rest of the equipment. And where would the power to generate that much power come from? Not to mention the fact that Frankfurt boasted about similar illumination back in 1730, 150 years before the official date.

Or one could simply use atmospheric electricity, etheric, with tin amalgam capacitors. The same ether that D. Mendeleev put at the top of his periodic table.

text:
Diorite is a very hard stone that is not subject to corrosion and can withstand acids. But what does its "Mohs hardness of 6" mean? It seems to us that it is possible to make any item, but it just needs a little bit more time.  Scientists always say that ancient man created such objects almost on an assembly line, using only wood and copper.

On the left are vases and a diorite figurine. They are 5,000 years old. On the right is the researchers' attempt to replicate the diorite vase with copper tools. This is the result they got in six months. Someone is either lying about the production technology or about the level of civilization.

text:
In 1960, the American historian and professor Charles Hapgood discovered in the Library of Congress a world map published in 1531 by the French geographer Aurons Finet, which depicts the Antarctic continent.

In 1569, the Flemish cartographer Gerard van Kremer (Mercator) created a collection of geographic maps called the Atlas. Kremer included the above map as well as several maps depicting Antarctica.
Mercator and Finet wrote that in compiling their maps they used maps created many centuries ago.

Now Antarctica is almost entirely covered by ice, the greatest thickness of which reaches four kilometers. The entire contour of the coastline is hidden by floating ice shelves. So the outlines of the Antarctic landmass, not to mention the topography of its surface, became possible to determine only by seismic exploration, which began in 1949 a joint Swedish-British Antarctic expedition.

text:
The statue of Vishvakarman is holding a mysterious artifact in his hand. But there is no mystery for surveyors, it is their standard working tool - construction theodolite.

One could argue that the theodolite usually works in tandem with a surveying ruler, but in his left hand the deity is just holding a long flat object similar to that very ruler. India is a country of grandiose temple complexes that cannot be built without precise measuring instruments. And up to this point, such instruments have never been found, but maybe we should look closely at the statue of the ancient gods?

text:
An Ancient Nuclear Vault in Africa 
 
Today there is a lot of evidence that previously there was a culture on our planet, much more developed than now. 
 
One such evidence is a nuclear waste repository that was found in Gabon in 1972. Its return is thought to be 1.8 billion years old. 
 
Scientists changed their minds about the origin of the burial ground when they conducted a thorough analysis of the rock. The source of radiation is uranium-235, covered with a thick layer of basalt, as an insulator. Almost the same technology was used in early nuclear waste repositories. 
 
Specialists are trying to find more evidence for their hunch that the repository is man-made, and if it is confirmed, our ideas about the past will have to change.

text:
A map with the continents of Liberia and Asgard.

Strange as it may seem, Hitler was convinced of the existence of more advanced civilizations of the past, and wanted to find the knowledge and technology of the past.

But the most interesting thing begins after the Germans visited Tibet and the monks, who supposedly had something to tell them about past civilizations.

Immediately afterwards, the Ahnenerbe headed for Antarctica, and judging by documents and maps, they tried to get into the hollow part of the Earth through a passage in the glaciers. To what extent this succeeded is unknown, as is whether or not anything can be found there at all.

But purely for coincidence, it is strange that right after Tibet, Hitler became interested in Antarctica, and together with the maps headed for the mysterious continent. In any case, it is impossible to know the truth.

text:
The interest in Mahenjo-Daro reached its peak when it was possible to study the excavated ruins from above. 

There was a trace of an inexplicably powerful wave. The walls and buildings were melted to greenish glass in some places. The skeletons of people were in their natural lifetime poses. Only those in the streets were frozen, their hands covering their faces. All this affected the outcome of the scientists' conclusions.
For about two years after the study, the data was not made public. 

However, some time later, the verdict was released to the world. Mohenjo-Daro - destroyed by a nuclear explosion. Other scientists who have studied the remains have also supported this version. 

The bones contained radioactive particles 50 times larger than normal.

The interest in Mahenjo-Daro reached its peak when it was possible to study the excavated ruins from above. 

There was a trace of an inexplicably powerful wave. The walls and buildings were melted to greenish glass in some places. The skeletons of people were in their natural lifetime poses. Only those in the streets were frozen, their hands covering their faces. All this affected the outcome of the scientists' conclusions.
For about two years after the study, the data was not made public. 

However, some time later, the verdict was released to the world. Mohenjo-Daro - destroyed by a nuclear explosion. Other scientists who have studied the remains have also supported this version. 

The bones contained radioactive particles 50 times larger than normal.

text:
Almost all maps prior to the 18th century depicted Japan as several times larger than it is today, and called the island Iapan.

It is interesting that the official history does not deny the existence of a larger island on the site of Japan, but it was supposedly at least 12,000 years ago, not 300 years ago.

But if this is true, why on all maps in the XV-XVI centuries it was Iapan? And why does the map show the same city names as in modern Japan? By the way, the population of the island is described with a different culture and a different appearance, if you compare it with the current Japanese.

text:
In 1971, the Rosenkreuz Museum in California came into possession of a perfectly preserved mummy. The study showed that 2,600 years ago, the Egyptians had performed a complex surgical operation, a prohibitive level of complexity for that era. The mummy had a 23cm metal orthopaedic pin in his knee.

Quite a modern technology that was known to the ancient Egyptians, but unknown to their descendants. Too much technology accumulates that shows the high level of development of ancient peoples and subsequent oblivion. In fact, humanity is forced to rediscover long-known but lost knowledge from thousands of years ago.

So were the ancestors so primitive if we are only reaching their level of development?

text:
The CIA's "Heart Attack Gun".

 A secret "needle gun" firing micro-caliber poisoned Javette arrows. When hit in the body, the arrow would quickly dissolve almost without trace, having previously infused the blood with a toxin that caused cardiac arrest. Considering that the caliber of the arrow was 0.03 inch (0.7 mm) or even less, traces from such a hit were very difficult to find.

text:
50 million-year-old man.

  In 1966, a skull identical to that of modern man was found on Mount Beld, in the Ciera Nevada Mountains, California. It is up to fifty-five million years old. All scientists and religious figures accepted the officially presented scientific evidence as truth. 

But as soon as the press began to write about the discovery, they immediately all kept silent, and the press declared the discovery a hoax. After all, according to the "Old Testament" the world was created only a little more than seven thousand years ago. It is known that many discoveries in the field of anthropology and archaeology have been made by scientists in the study of drawings and inscriptions made in very ancient times on the human bones.

text:
Do you know what "rapid electric photography" is? In Astrakhan in 1897 they know.
 
Electrophotography is a photographic process based on the conversion of a visible image into a distribution (relief) of electrostatic potential (latent electric image) on a photoconductive layer of a dielectric or high resistance semiconductor (mostly selenium or zinc oxide) followed by a reverse conversion - relief visualization.

text:
To read the secrets of 120 countries, the CIA sold encryption machines

The German and U.S. intelligence services collected secret information from other nations for decades because they had direct access to the Swiss encryption equipment manufacturer Crypto AG. 

This firm supplied encryption devices to the governments of 120 countries from the beginning of the Cold War until the 2000s. U.S. and German intelligence had the key to all the ciphers, so they could read the secret communications of countries like Iran, India and Pakistan.

The highly classified program, conducted jointly by the CIA and the German foreign intelligence service BND, was reported by several world media outlets, including the American Washington Post, the German TV channel ZDF and the Swiss channel SRF. They gained access to secret CIA internal archives calling the operation an "intelligence success of the century.

Neither the USSR, followed by Russia, nor China, trusted this equipment and never used it.

text:
St. Joseph's Women's Monastery in Switzerland. Suvorov stayed here at the end of his Swiss campaign.

The convent contains a unique handwritten chronicle in which the abbesses of the convent recorded their observations.
The book was begun in 1288 and finished in 1945.

The ink hasn't faded and the paper hasn't weathered in 732 years.

The date - i799 - can be seen on the stop frame of the record.
The date shows traces of editing. One can assume that someone made a mistake at the time of writing. 
But it is also possible to assume a deliberate correction for the benefit of certain rulers/powers/circumstances. 
This is how chronology is corrected, quietly and within the walls of monasteries. And such manuscripts are often the primary sources for a large body of information.

text:
The first human rights declaration in history

The Cyrus cylinder is a clay cylinder on which Cyrus the Great commanded to inscribe in cuneiform a list of his victories and gracious deeds, as well as a list of his ancestors. The artifact was discovered during the excavations of Babylon in 1879 and came into the British Museum.

The cylinder became famous after the last Shah of Iran in the 1960s proclaimed the text inscribed on it as the first ever declaration of human rights: Cyrus spoke in favor of the abolition of slavery and religious freedom. The Shah pledged to build his policy in accordance with the precepts of the founder of Persian statehood.

text:
Myth - fiction or reality?

The clay tablets of Sumer named five cities that existed before the Flood: Eridu, Bab Tibir, Larak, Sippar, and Shuruppak. 

If the Flood is fiction, then the cities are "fiction" too. But there were archaeologists who were open-minded skeptics. They found the cities of Eridu, Sippar and Shuruppak, and during the excavations they found traces of a great flood. The notorious flood of which the biblical texts tell us was based on a real event.

It is time to stop thinking of the myths as the authors' sick fantasy. They can lead researchers to sensational discoveries.

text:
Edward Lidskalnin he built the so-called Coral Castle in Florida. He was short (about 1.6 m) and weighed about 50 kilograms, but such modest size did not prevent him from single-handedly moving stone blocks weighing up to 30 tons. At the same time he always worked alone.

A small number of eyewitnesses differ in their versions: two teenagers claim to have seen the huge stones floating in the air; others assure that they saw some equipment resembling a wooden tripod and some ropes (but even this equipment did not look powerful enough to lift such massive stone structures). 

Edward Lidskalnin is said to have used some kind of small black box, which he himself called a "stabilizing perpetual motion machine. Lidskalnin himself claimed to have discovered the secret of the Egyptian pyramids. It is a pity that he did not have time (or did not want) to share it with mankind.
